post_text:
🌟trigger warning🌟

Hello ladies. I need ur help. So on Sunday night I was a victim of domestic violence. My husband left me with a black eye, bloody nose, and many bruises on my body. I had been working at EUROPEAN WAX CENTER NORTH HAVEN, CT location. On Monday morning...literally hours after the incident, I texted my boss And showed her a picture of my face. She told me that it was mandatory training and I couldn’t miss it.

I didn’t have clothes cuz I ran out of the house after the incident with my husband. I had to hurry up and leave cuz I had to be at the training in 30 min! I was absolutely mortified!! I didn’t want to lose my job and so I stayed the entire shift. That night I asked to have the following day off seeing as my body couldn’t handle standing for hours. Plus I didn’t have ANY of my belongings.

She proceeded to tell me I had no coverage for my shift . That night I was at the police station and made a report and they told me I should go to the ER and get it documented. The next morning I went to the ER and had texted misty to let her know. they told me I have a fractured nose and gave me a note for two days of rest till I had to go back to work

So I went in today for my shift and she sat me down and told me that basically I was a no call no show on Tuesday and that I QUIT!!! That I had no excuse not coming into work and that basically I had a chance to leave my husband and didn’t so now look what happened. They had absolutely no compassion and treated me as though I was trash. She did not care about my doctors note or that any of this happened.

She was saying I didn’t call her. Idk what they expected. Everyone literally saw me hours after it and saw the proof. My body was under so much stress and I just needed two days to recuperate. They are horrible people and I feel like I was discriminated against because of domestic violence. Oh and when I went there Monday for the training. NOT ONE MANAGER pulled me to the side to talk to me..console me..ask me if I was ok. NOTHING!!! I feel like something needs to be done and this just isn’t right!!

How did they even expect me to take clients in the state that I was in!!??!?

that i had no excuse not coming into work and that basically i had a chance to leave my husband and didn’t so now look what happened. they had absolutely no compassion and treated me as though i was trash. she did not care about my doctors note or that any of this happened.  she was saying i didn’t call her. idk what they expected. everyone literally saw me hours after it and saw the proof. my body was under so much stress and i just needed two days to recuperate. they are horrible people and i feel like i was discriminated against because of domestic violence. oh and when i went there monday for the training. not one manager pulled me to the side to talk to me..console me..ask me if i was ok. nothing!!! i feel like something needs to be done and this just isn’t right!!  how did they even expect me to take clients in the state that i was in!!??!?

post_text:
QUESTION was it me.... 🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺.

Was it because of me asking him to get up in the morning to see his autistic son off to school so it would seem like he was spending SOME kind of time with his son as opposed to the time he spent with him changing his diaper I don't consider that spending time. See I consider spending time playing the video games, watching a movie, going to doctor's appointments, just a day out, watching TV, dancing, singing and laughing together spending time together but he did NONE of those things as OPPOSED to ME which I do these things DAILY.....

What my narcissistic ex boyfriend of which could have been 12 years 2-27-21 but he left after getting caught cheating with a co-worker on 1-2-21 talk about happy new year right 😭😭😭. ANYWAYS what he DID do on the regular was EMOTIONALLY scarred, mentally ABUSED me on the regular and when I say the regular I mean EVERYDAY literally he found a way to bring up my disability as I am a disabled mom of 6 kids now and I've been through knee, back, stomach and dental surgery. And he tried to make me feel so UGLY 😭😭😭😭 and wanted and cared about on a DAILY 💔😭. He ALWAYS found a reason to tell and scream at me when it was even something positive I was BLESSED with $1000 in groceries for December and he asked how that benefited him but he sure ate good that month and I was able to pay more bills and buy more gifts for the family which he bought no one anything none of the kids and most definitely NOT me 🥺🥺🥺🥺. This was my THIRD and FINAL time trying to be a two parent in house family for our three kids together as he was apart of my other three kids life for awhile as well. But this was the FINAL time. See I'm that dummy that wasn't raised in a two family home and I was willing to try and do anything to keep my kids with both their parents even the emotional, mental abuse that I took on the daily for my kids that come first and foremost to me I would do anything and THENSOME to keep them HAPPY and wlt them know they are LOVED....

But what REALLY got me feeling stupid is after he left one of my kids said they were glad he was gone because no more YELLING and CUSSING at MOMMY 😭😭😭😭😭. That broke my heart as I was trying to keep a two parent family together when it was dead and gone a long time ago after he first cheated and abandoned his kids and myself.

And this final time he's on drugs now don't know for how long or whatnot it he had lost 60 pounds in 6 months and it was no dieting honey we was enjoying fast food and everything together. And his aggressive attitude towards me was BEGINNING to get worse and arguments of even having to change our autistic son came and YEAH I knew things were slowly but surely coming to an end but I still TRIED for my KIDS 😭🥺🥺🥺🥺😭😭.

So now I am a 43yr old disabled mom of 6 kids in Ohio raising kids with special needs and things and wondering if I'm just going to be ALONE the rest of my life and that DEPRESSES me on so many levels. Because I'm a BIG romantic I love cuddling hugging kissing spending time with one that's for me and as I am for him and happy and loving. And all I feel right now is sad, DEPRESSED, lonely, hurt and not myself on so many levels. And I'm sad the happiness I have is through my kids and NOT my OWN. But as long as my kids are happy, safe, Blessed and provided for that God gives me the strength to continue to do. I guess I have to just be fine with THAT 😭😭😭😭😭. And I will be I hope and pray and maybe the wants of the hugs and kisses, cuddling and things will continue to dwindle down and I would no longer yearn for those things as I do NOW but don't have.

I mean i just want a relationship with TRUST loyalty honesty respect patience love compassion and romance is that asking alot 🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺.

Question

Since my ex left in January and was stalking and harrassing me earlier part of the year it's died down now thank goodness but he broke in my house on 2-18-21 he smeared poop on my van 3-7-21 so to try to find some kind of positiveness out of all that drama and mess I got my kids a cat a couple months ago with the craziness of my ex breaking in and things THOUGHT it would be a nice addition and it is they're happier than ever and that makes me happy as I find happiness through them that sounds sad doesn't it ,🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺.

I wonder each and every day NOW as I'm a 43yr old single mom of 6 kids with special needs and I have my own health situations will I ONLY have happiness through them as I make sure my babies are happy and want for nothing I did that for my ex as well 🥺🥺🥺😭😭😭😭😭😭. But I still wasn't enough and I know it's because of my not complying with his unsanitzing issues let's say as I'm not gonna perform things and you're not being clean to urself so he cheats with someone that doesn't care about his uncleaned ways SMDH it is what is but at some point I have standards DAMNIT and disgusting unclean body is just a major turn off for me...

So the few questions throughout this post....

1. Is it wrong the happiness I have is through my kids and not REALLY my own.

2. Do y'all think with the things mentioned above that there's still a way of me having my own HAPPINESS 🥺🥺🥺😭😭😭😭😭😭🥺

3. When will the pain end how long do I have to deal and be in this funk of sadness when there should be gladness. 🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺

4. Is it possible to find someone that can TRULY deal with the baggage another person has

5. Will I ever have my OWN TRUE HAPPINESS and LOVE 🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺....

6. Is it okay to be spending time with more than one guy as I try to figure all this mess out as I dont like to be alone but I'm not settling for less ANYMORE and I don't think my expectations are asking to MUCH... As they are honesty, trust, companionship, respect for me as well as my kids, loyalty, 50/50, treating me as his Queen as I would treat him as my king, loves music, watching TV and movies and doesn't mind being home and not always needing to go out loving to be at home enjoying one another company and playing video games together...

I mean that's all I'm asking is that asking too much 🥺🥺🥺😭😭😭😭😭🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺

post_text:
Things are still so hard... I'm sinking further and further into depression knowing that my only means to survival for my daughter and I, is to go back to him. I'm so destroyed knowwing that my escape has failed 😢

We made it from the shelter to emergency housing to our own place restraining orders and emergency protection orders are in place and charges have been pressed, and are slowly getting on our feet, but we have nothing. I have been approved for low income benefits and am on the wait lists for everything. Which first check is coming on June 30th. So that's a releif. The food bank is able to serve me the end of this week, thank God (they provide approx 60$ worth of food, monthly) so I can see the end of this nightmare, and can see the life that we fought so hard to have, just around the corner.

But getting "around that corner", is impossible. I don't mind going without, trust me... I would gladly never eat again for the rest of my life to be free from him..but with stitches (from his last sexual assault, which are coming out next week! Yayy!) And being incontinent (number 1 and 2) from the damage he did, with my daughter and I both having the flu (I would imagine cos we are so run down) not having the basics to get through a day, has now gotten to the point that I can't get through another day like this. I have tried salvation army,churches, government, politician, etc etc and have been approved and placed on wait lists. There is just no immediate help to be had.

I feel like such a failure, to have even failed at our escape, to have it within reach and still not be able to get to it. I can't believe that everything I went through to get the here, to being free,.was all for nothing, I'm absolutely devastated here and really need some kind words as I'm falling apart.

post_text:
Good morning QUICK QUESTION AS IT ENDED UP ME VENTING ALOT THIS MORNING

HOW DO YOU WOMEN MOVE ON STAY STRONG AND NOT HURT AND HAVE PAIN..???????? FOR YOURSELF AND YOUR KIDS

AS I sit here with my two babies in my bed from having a rough night sleep I wonder.... WHY my narc ex would do this to these kids and myself a third and my FINAL time.... To cheat with a co-worker when he's supposed to be working to help and provide for his family 😭😭🥺🥺🥺😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭. Can't even TRUST him to go to work so how could I been. So STUPID to take him back and tried to be a two parent family after he's cheated TWICE already how and why was I so STUPID to try

My kids didn't DESERVE this no way no how and I FEEL so STUPID as they said they're glad he's gone no more YELLING and CUSSING at MOMMY SMH but I was trying to keep a two parent family for them I thought as I have different health conditions I go through and I wonder who would understand who would want me as I'm now a single mom of 6 kids and some have special needs from my autistic son who's 11 but is 6ft3 265 pounds wearing a size 15 men's shoe, to all of my kids including myself being hard of hearing as it's genetic and will even follow my kids to their kids 🥺🥺🥺 to my about to be 18 yr old child born with a cleft pallet cleft lip and sometimes not really able to understand him COMPLETELY even after he's been through 5 surgeries or my cognitive delayed 16 yr old who's mindset is of a 8yr old and has personal space issues and things then 3 of the 6 have a pseudoparohythyrodism condition

Then there's ME I've been through k we surgery due to domestic violence from my older three kids father which left a plate in my knee, to a stomach surgery that left me with constant stomach pains on the regular now as the reason is unknown, to the oral surgery to prevent oral cancer, to the back surgery ☹️☹️🥺🥺😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭. I've been through alot in my 43yrs of living but don't get me wrong I'm BLESSED NONETHELESS because it could be better but it could be worse so I count my blessings....

And then this stomach situation I deal with at least twice a week sucks on so MANY LEVELS who's gonna UNDERSTAND who's gonna want me 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭.

And then there's the special needs factors of my children that's a whole nutha level... I'm just gonna have to except the fact that I'm not going to have that someone laying beside me in the bed at night ANYMORE 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭. The companionship of another guy waking up next to him in my bed holding,loving,kissing me and making me feel wanted loved appreciated and SPECIAL. I think my days are done and it HURTS so MUCH 😭...

I then think of how my ex is out here neglecting his responsibility as a father and things as he let this his new co-worker gd turn him into DRUGS and things as he lost 60 pounds before we broke up 1-2-21 SMH and he was already posting on 1-3-21 he was in a relationship that hurt like a MUTHA a little especially when the stimulus money was coming and going into his account money he was gonna get for our kids to spend with another BRAWD oh hell naw I called IRS and found out eventho I'm a disabled mom I can claim my kids myself and he's gonna have to repay what he received (SOMETHING GOOD TO HEAR FINALLY TO A DEGREE) EVENTHO I'M STILL WAITING CUZ he did receive his already and mine got rejected and delayed 🥺🥺😭😭😭😭😭. But I don't care cuz knowing that I will be receiving it is all that matters as I'm trying to move since he was harrassing and stalking for awhile he e en broke in the house in Feb and wrote DIE on the walls in the front room bathroom and kids room traumatizing them SMH who would do THAT 🥺🥺🥺🥺.

JUST please keep me in prayer as EVERYDAY is a challenge a struggle that I PRAY eases up on my heart and my mind to forget him especially for all the things he DONE to me all the PAIN and HURT he's caused over the would been 12 years 2-27-21 🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺.

I won't lie I want that companionship I need that companionship I yearn for that companionship and I've made STUPID mistakes since my ex has left but I'm human and do live and learn.

Just wishing I wasn't ALWAYS feeling so
ALONE UNWANTED AND UNLOVED 🥺😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭.

post_text:
Mishandeling - hy kan verander!
Ons verstaan mishandeling; ons ken die verwoestende manipulasie van die man, en die emosies van waardeloosheid van die vrou. Maar daar is oplossings, maniere om mishandeling te hanteer, want mense kan verander! Emosionele mishandeling is erger as fisiese mishandeling. Word toegerus met die feite, neem ingeligte besluite, daar is ‘n uitweg!

Abuse - he can change!
We understand abuse; we know the man's devastating manipulation, and the emotions of worthlessness of woman. But there are solutions, ways to deal with abuse because people can change! Emotional abuse is worse than physical abuse. Get equipped with the facts, make informed decisions, there's a way out!

post_text:
Please please could you sign and share this holds dear to myself and my family
Unfortunately on the 28/11/2019 our world changed forever we was informed about our logan passing a health happy little boy this shocked our family since his passing sadly my brother logans dad battled with his sons loss for 10 months until he could battle no more we lost him also on 22/09/2020 he didn't get the support he needed from these professionals as he was not with the mother as they had separated
It took until December 2020 before logans inquest took place this is a traumatic event for any family member to go to as some of the things we were told was utterly disgusting we as a family lost so much and this could of been avoided he had cocaine in his blood stream no child should have this there inquest paperwork states he either injested or had been exposed to the significance of this was unable to be determine the effect it had on him but we know it wouldn't be any good to him he was neglect and exposed to this kind of harm when his mother should of done the 1 thing she should do which is to love and protect him from harm and she didn't do this

We need a new criminal charge created so babies/children are not just forgotten and it brushed under the carpet as unasertanted as a class A drug kills grown adults so what on earth does it do to a 5 month old baby
Since this has happened we have looked into other cases where babies have died and also have class A drugs within the blood stream and there is no criminal charges we as a society has become blind to this we need change babies/children should be safeguarded and protected from this kind of neglect and abuse

When has it ever been legal for cocaine to be in an adults body let alone a baby or child

Help if you can
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580647

post_text:
I've been trying to move on and deal with my narcissistic ex situation on other ways and I'm feeling lost and confused right now I was just in the hospital 5-4-21 but I'm blessed to say it was nothing serious as it could have been because of a STUPID decision I made. But God had his hands on me and saw me through. I have 6 kids so when I say this next sentence some may WONDER WHY I say it HERE IT IS... "I FEEL SO ALONE" As I'm taking care of these kids all by myself trying to provide and be the best mom I can be and let them know that I WOULD NEVER ABANDON THEM EVER unlike their deadbeat father did. 🥺🥺😭😭😭😭😭. I'm in so much pain as I gave my narc ex three chances of him cheating on me to try and be a family but what I just came to terms to realize is he thinks that and thought that I will ALWAYS take him back after his months of cheating and then realizing the grass wasn't GREENER well this last time was the FINAL time he took it to another level and he's Dead to me.. he cheated on me with his co-worker so I can't even trust you to go make money to help PROVIDE for our family as she turned him on to drugs and things and he's lost tremendous weight he use to like taking pictures but no anymore I guess he doesn't look right so now he doesn't. SMH. As to why I even care but I do sad to say cuz he is still the father of 3 of my 6 kids 🥺🥺🥺🥺. And it hurts my heart so much for the pain he's caused me as well as our kids he broke in the house in February and wrote DIE on the walls in the kids room, bathroom and living room so I ask myself WHY y do I still care and feel so STUPID that I do it would have been 12 yrs 2-27-21 and we broke up 1-2-21 talk about the way to bring in a new year huh.

And his mom I use to do things for her birthday and holidays to let her see or talk to the kids but I had to stop as she put the BLAME on me for his cheating his using drugs as I don't smoke drink or do drugs but she NEVER blames her son for his WRONG and ALWAYS blamed me so is it wrong that I blocked her out of me and my kids lives as I blocked him while he's lying on me in the world to play the VICTIM when he caused all this DRAMA and PAIN.

We have an autistic son that's 11 yrs old and a handful he's 6ft3 inches tall 265 pounds in adult diapers and wears 15 men's shoe and has to take medication that gives him an increase in appetite so he's ALWAYS hungry and my ex pays child support of $400 for the three kids HOW'S that even enough when there's three kids but I'm blessed and grateful for that don't get me wrong cuz my older three kids father pays $5 SMH but it's crucial when providing food, clothes, and things they need on top of paying the bills to maintain a roof over our heads. And he's just living it up to some degree not helping with his kids but harassing and stalking me in the girl he's with van. I MEAN

Any advice... Because I'm so lost and confused. I have a psychiatrist I talk to once a week but that's SOOOOOOOOOO not enough. I try to stay positive and.keep bad thoughts away and I'm so BLESSED for the strength and courage God has given me.

To all that are going through tough and similar situations I PRAY FOR YOUR STRENGTH TO KEEP MOVING FORWARD.

post_text: After one year and 2 months of him beating g me justice is served!! 2 broken ribs nose,and a 3 days in the hospital NO jail time but I feel this is worse than jail time! 3yrs probation, he has to wear a SCRAM monitor which!!! He has to pay for 2yrs. The gps monitor is for 3yrs. If he doesn't pay the restitution monthly or the SCRAM fails The Judge firmly addressed that HE WILL GO DIRECTLY TO THE PENETANTRIARY! post_text:
I do not KNOW any La-Ti-NO men or women in East Boston. I live alone and is not associated with then in any way. They have been Racist to me! They have been stalking and harassing me for over 4 months in my apartment building, on trains, buses, parks, in the streets everywhere In Boston. They even followed me to New York and stalked and harassed me there. It’s a big sex ring in the community.

They ran a whore house in their apartment and has been bringing White Men into the building to their apartments to come sexuality over my head and collecting money for it. They also send their customers White Men, Latino Men to harass me as I step out of the building I am harass by different kind of Men that I don’t Know. The Latino women help them to do all these things in East Boston. I am been attacked by the entire race over here!

After 6 police Reports and a restraining order that was denied today. I need help to deal with these racists discussing people. I don’t even know their names I never saw most of them in the 4 years I live in Boston.
My True and Real Black Brothers and Sisters, All of America who don’t condone racism and violence against women I need your help immediately. It’s an emergency!

Details Below:
I have experienced Racism, hate crimes, human trafficking, sex trafficking, stalking, invasion of privacy of a black woman, harassment and sexual assault. These acts are being done by the head of the apartment above me a LA.TI.NO man and his entire family including gang members that works for him in the apartment 22 at 186 Cottage Street. East Boston MA. 02128.

Due to low income housing there is no sound privacy at my apartment. So I’m being followed from room to room from apartment 22 where he is running a whore house and is being harass on a daily basis. The Tenants and is whore house customers are locating where I am in my apartment and bringing his dad in the wheelchair to come sexually over my head from their apartment. I found this out one day when they were bragging in the basement what they are doing to me. The Latino man head of the apartment said where is that N word I can’t locate her in her apartment. My dad is ready to come over her head. This is what we do all night whether she is standing, sitting or lying down.

This has escalated to date where he now bringing his friends and whore house customers, all type of men in a secure building to his apartment to come sexually over my head and collecting money for this service. The basement door near to the apartment that they use for entrance is open over 1 million times from nights throughout the mornings every day. I am not able to sleep or relax in my home due to the constant noise and the basement steps and in their apartment. I also saw lots of men coming from their apartment at different interval late at nights through to the mornings there is always strange men in the building.

The stalking and harassment has also escalated to outside of the building where I am now followed, stalked and harassed by his gang members and whore house customers around Boston. Everywhere I go, as In step out of my apartment Building, in trains, on buses, walking in the streets, he send his Latino gang members, his customers to stalk and harass me until I come back home. I can’t go to the supermarket or at the park near by without being harass by Latino women and men.

The family and his friends has harassed me verbally from their apartment by yelling the N word at me through their apartment. At one point they had a N word party where they invited other tenants from the building to do the same thing. It was the most disgusting thing I had ever experienced living here in America.

My apartment was also broken into and I am still missing an iPhone and a key to date.
I called the police and made up to 6 reports but nothing has been done to date to resolve these issue.
Share! Share! Share! and Keep Sharing!

post_text:
name is Courtney. Really, life is crazy! And I'm trying. I'm a single mom. Of a beautiful smart little life saver. She's my everything. She is my reason to believe it gets better. So a few years ago I was with a man and he was on his way to come see me and got into a car accident and died, a few years before that I was with my first boyfriend ever he was very abusive. The only person that stuck up for me was my best friend. And he beat him up for it. We went home and then I got beat up for it (this was in 2013 so yeah I was young.) And later on that Sunday my best friend took his own life. So for years I blamed myself. For not leaving for thinking he would change. For the only person who tried to save me dying. And now I just got out of a relationship and it was so great at first. He was the first person I cared for in a while. He knew parts of me even I didn't know and he ended up using everything against me. He started beating me up. He threw me into walls, because he cheated on me. He threw fans at me. Pushed me up against walls with threats. Became my worst night mare. And my best dream. In the same sentence. An abusive relationship is so much more than just physical abuse.. It's being broken beyond any thought possible, my money was taken so I couldn't go do anything or move without him, my self esteem broken, my smile, my laugh, my soul, my family and friends were pushed away. I found a place I'm just trying to figure out the money. Please maybe point me in the right direction. All I ever wanted was to give my daughter everything, a better childhood than I had. And here i am screwing that all up. I'm failing at the one thing in life im supposed to make sure i succeed at. I don't even know where to start. I just want a second chance.. To start all over again and just be all about me and her.... And maybe eventually i can go back to college.. . I want to be the best me i can be for her.. Shes 3. Shes soaking everything up right now. I want her to know she can get through anything and in order to show her she can do that, i have to do that. And lately im not so sure i can.....that stereotype of a woman with a black eye, split lip or whatever is only a small part of the whole picture of abusive relationships. Domestic violence includes rape, sexual assault, robbery, and aggravated and simple assault by partners, immediate family members, or other relatives and friends. I lost everyone I feel like. The few friends I did have now want nothing to do with me i think because they are afraid of him? I'm not really sure. Im confused. So confused on how the people I love with my whole heart and soul can leave me out all alone when i need them the most... I am just looking for any kind of help i can get. I have tried so many different sites. It's been a month now. And im still trying to get help. I know of plenty of places for rent/sale now its just getting a call back from one and having the money. I just want something that is ours. Something noone can ever take away from us...I'm from steuben county ny
Looking to be pointed in the right direction for maybe an advocate to help apply for Grant's answers such or help reach out about clothes, furniture, rent help for a new place etc. It gets exhausting telling my story again and again. P.s no one will help me find a place says I have to go into shelter then they will help. I don't want to stay with strangers. Trust is a huge problem for me.
P.s if a landlord can give me paperwork showing how much rent is so I have the right stuff to get help, i can probably be ready with the money to move in tomorrow. I so badly need an apartment. I miss my daughter so much. I dont want my daughter to walk in my footsteps. But I do want her to walk next to me, and even past me. Way further than I ever even dreamt possible. I want her to be the best little her she can be. And for that to happen i need to be the best me. And I feel like I'm not doing a good job right now. We just need a home so we can be back together. I miss her so much. "We think sometimes that poverty is only being hungry, naked, and homeless. The poverty of being unwanted, unloved, and uncared for is the greatest poverty. We must start in our own homes to remedy this kind of poverty" – Mother Teresa

"Homelessness is not a choice, but rather a journey that many find themselves in."– Asa Don Brown
Okay yes. I was putting up with stuff I never should have. I was keeping my mouth shut about it. For months. But now I left. And I'm telling my story. I'm not going to let the fact that everyone left me behind because I choose to be loyal to what is right and not to a person because they are wrong. I'll always stand up for that and my right to be happy. I found myself. Now please help me find a home

P.s is there anyone that can cash app me 5 for gas to get my kids bunkbed from there while he still in jail for the night $courtyy21

text_blob: name is courtney. really, life is crazy! and i'm trying. i'm a single mom. of a beautiful smart little life saver. she's my everything. she is my reason to believe it gets better. so a few years ago i was with a man and he was on his way to come see me and got into a car accident and died, a few years before that i was with my first boyfriend ever he was very abusive. the only person that stuck up for me was my best friend. and he beat him up for it. we went home and then i got beat up for it (this was in      so yeah i was young.) and later on that sunday my best friend took his own life. so for years i blamed myself. for not leaving for thinking he would change. for the only person who tried to save me dying. and now i just got out of a relationship and it was so great at first. he was the first person i cared for in a while. he knew parts of me even i didn't know and he ended up using everything against me. he started beating me up. he threw me into walls, because he cheated on me. he threw fans at me. pushed me up against walls with threats. became my worst night mare. and my best dream. in the same sentence. an abusive relationship is so much more than just physical abuse.. it's being broken beyond any thought possible, my money was taken so i couldn't go do anything or move without him, my self esteem broken, my smile, my laugh, my soul, my family and friends were pushed away. i found a place i'm just trying to figure out the money. please maybe point me in the right direction. all i ever wanted was to give my daughter everything, a better childhood than i had. and here i am screwing that all up. i'm failing at the one thing in life im supposed to make sure i succeed at. i don't even know where to start. i just want a second chance.. to start all over again and just be all about me and her.... and maybe eventually i can go back to college.. . i want to be the best me i can be for her.. shes  . shes soaking everything up right now. i want her to know she can get through anything and in order to show her she can do that, i have to do that. and lately im not so sure i can.....that stereotype of a woman with a black eye, split lip or whatever is only a small part of the whole picture of abusive relationships. domestic violence includes rape, sexual assault, robbery, and aggravated and simple assault by partners, immediate family members, or other relatives and friends. i lost everyone i feel like. the few friends i did have now want nothing to do with me i think because they are afraid of him? i'm not really sure. im confused. so confused on how the people i love with my whole heart and soul can leave me out all alone when i need them the most... i am just looking for any kind of help i can get. i have tried so many different sites. it's been a month now. and im still trying to get help. i know of plenty of places for rent/sale now its just getting a call back from one and having the money. i just want something that is ours. something noone can ever take away from us...i'm from steuben county ny looking to be pointed in the right direction for maybe an advocate to help apply for grant's answers such or help reach out about clothes, furniture, rent help for a new place etc. it gets exhausting telling my story again and again. p.s no one will help me find a place says i have to go into shelter then they will help. i don't want to stay with strangers. trust is a huge problem for me. p.s if a landlord can give me paperwork showing how much rent is so i have the right stuff to get help, i can probably be ready with the money to move in tomorrow. i so badly need an apartment. i miss my daughter so much. i dont want my daughter to walk in my footsteps. but i do want her to walk next to me, and even past me. way further than i ever even dreamt possible. i want her to be the best little her she can be. and for that to happen i need to be the best me. and i feel like i'm not doing a good job right now. we just need a home so we can be back together. i miss her so much. "we think sometimes that poverty is only being hungry, naked, and homeless. the poverty of being unwanted, unloved, and uncared for is the greatest poverty. we must start in our own homes to remedy this kind of poverty" – mother teresa  "homelessness is not a choice, but rather a journey that many find themselves in."– asa don brown okay yes. i was putting up with stuff i never should have. i was keeping my mouth shut about it. for months. but now i left. and i'm telling my story. i'm not going to let the fact that everyone left me behind because i choose to be loyal to what is right and not to a person because they are wrong. i'll always stand up for that and my right to be happy. i found myself. now please help me find a home  p.s is there anyone that can cash app me   for gas to get my kids bunkbed from there while he still in jail for the night $courtyy

post_text: I am not usually the abuse victim. The victim is my mother. However, she has just become financially abusive after I told her I was fed up of seeing her physically and sexually abused by my uncle, who also abuses me. I want to run away to a refuge. I have learning difficulties and she keeps telling me it is all my fault that I am abused. She has made my grandad stop supporting me so I cannot runaway. I would really appreciate some advice. I am so scared.

post_text:
What did I do to deserve this I ask because see the STUPIDITY of me of what would have been 12 years 2-27-21 my ex cheated on me with a co-worker but I just recently found out that there's more to it that him and his manager that's his friend before he was his boss they were having sex with CO-WORKERS on the job as a previous coworker that worked with them let me know as my exes friend the manager was having sex with girls in the storage room at the Arby's they work at and in the parking lot in his car then where does my head go I let my ex drive my old van to work OMG was he having sex in my van 🥺🥺🥺😭😭😭 as it had the stench of cigarettes and I don't know what else as I just recently cleaned it out and just got depressed and more pissed I even cleaned it before cleaning out my own van I'm driving now cuz just the thought of that OMG just couldn't wrap my head around it.....

See I'm 43yrs old and I've had man so much done to me my heartbroken numerous times I've been used and ABUSED by boyfriend's friends, family and it HURTS so bad because I give my ALL to help out others and then the thanks I get is ABUSED and HURT and Cheated on.... WHY me.....

I don't drink,smoke, or do drugs I just FIRST AND FOREMOST make sure my KIDS are HAPPY and have everything they want and need in their lives which is the ONLY way I can see happiness I know that sounds pathetic to see happiness ONLY through my KIDS but I wouldn't even know how to acknowledge or accept my own HAPPINESS ANYMORE cuz I'm at the point to WONDERING will I EVER have my OWN TRUE HAPPINESS 🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺. I've been through knee surgery from domestic violence from a previous relationship that I tried to make work for the kids stupidly there as well as the final draw was when he broke my knee in six places 🥺🥺🥺🥺. As I tried to stay a family with him through cheating and things but breaking my knee in front of my kids getting off their school bus to witness it was the last draw for me there and then

My narc recently cheating ex... We got together in 2009 as I didn't believe anyone would want me with the scar I had on my knee and I was still on crutches when me and my now ex got together MY SELF-ESTEEM WAS SO LOW..... So he accepted me even though I didn't ask for much he didn't work for 6 yrs as all I wanted was to be wanted to have someone around me and to help me with at the time my 3 kids and NOT feel ALONE and UNWANTED I gave him everything he wanted and needed Xbox, cigarettes, weed just as long as he was around me and that's all I asked and then 2015 we now have six kids he I believe EXPERIENCED with some kind of white powder drug that had him more agitated and aggressive towards me and his attitude changed toward the kids as he asked why the kids come before him EVEN that 😡😡. They're my kids they come FIRST AND FOREMOST but by this time me and him have had 3 kids where I was pregnant with him at least five times and one miscarriage early in 2010 and then in 2013 I had a baby sac with no baby and I had my dad watching my kids and he fell asleep and my then three yr old autistic son was wondering in the streets children services took my kids for 4 months and my mom didn't like my now ex that she let the then two kids I had with him go to Foster care and took the older three that RECEIVED SSI because my mom was money hungry that's a whole different story though 😭😭😭🥺🥺🥺🥺😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭..so I been through alot with my now ex I had back surgery in 2015 I had to have my gallbladder removed because it almost ruptured as I went in the er with a 103 fever yeah it was very crucial MY LIFE 🥺 😭😭😭😭😭😭. So he was there THROUGH alot but THAT STILL DOESN'T MEAN I DESERVE WHAT HE DID at the end of 2015 he cheated on me and then I took him back 8 months later for him to do the same thing give months later and go back to the girl and then 9 months later I took him back yet again and this time with stipulations and requirements him needing to help take care of our three kids together getting his autistic son ready for school daily helping change his diapers and he had to get a job and provide some kind of income to the house and pay his child support...... Yes I wasn't to STUPID on some LEVELS to a dey but VERY DUMB on others as I shouldn't have taken him BACK 😡😔😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭 to be where I'm at now ALONE with 6 kids... I started noticing changes throughout the pandemic and things up until he actually left after getting caught he lost 60 pounds in 6 months no DIETING at all just tremendously dropping weight and not looking right and then more arguing and agitating moments with him for no reason in front of the kids just YELLING at me downing me making me feel so low and lost and even more depressed 😢 he gave me $200 a month and said that made him head of the house while I fit the $2700 monthly bills for rent utilities groceries insurance and everything else but I was okay with him and his $200 I know STUPID of me yet again 😭😭. And then the day he left I had a romantic night planned for him on 1-2-21 but the SURPRISE was on me he got off work at 930 but I pulled up at his job at 1145 where he was there with the COWORKER girl I asked for my keys to my van and I said please don't throw my key at me and what did he do just that threw it in my face as I sat in the old van so he couldn't take it so he then breaks the mirror on my new van as he turned around to leave I called the police which is right next door to his job and go figure they sugar-coated the police reports I made cuz they knew my ex and I believe truly that's why my CPO order got DISMISSED as they all are at my exes job even the DAMN judge knew him SMDH 😭😭😭🤷🏿‍♀️🤷🏿‍♀️🤷🏿‍♀️. So I had no chance but I'm trying to move so he doesn't know where I am I even was when this all went down trying to talk to his mom she told me he broke my rearview mirror and me calling the police I took it out of proportion like I usually do SMH so I have blocked them ALL..

I'm trying to put on a brave face for my kids and get back out in the dating world I guess but have made tremendously big mistakes there... As I tried to help someone that ended up homeless let him move in as a Friend and he ended up wanting more eventho I had a male friend he got mad when he saw me and my friend and tried to have my kids TAKEN as he KNOW that is the hardest way to hurt me AND I COULDN'T BELIEVE THAT..... So YEAH STUPID STUPID me on so many levels... Please don't judge my stupidity there I'm already beating myself up enough 😭😭😭😭🥺🥺🥺 I mean I was taking this guy to work at 630 in the mornings picking him up I even had got the electric in my name for 10 days before he lost his place that's how caring and always trying to help SOMEONE and what does that get me where do I END UP them trying to HURT me I couldn't believe he tried to get my kids taken WTH was I thinking so now between the mess with my ex in February breaking into my house yeah I forgot to mention that he broke in my house and wrote DIE on the walls in the front room kids room and bathroom to let me know he made a spare key even to the key I took SMH do traumatized my kids that was the last draw and before I knew of the brawd van he pulled up on me and was following me around and one day at McDonald's with my daughter he pulled up ASKING for some shoes I bought him for Xmas SMH no mention of how are my kids this and that nope just can u find my shoes uh NOOOOOOOOOOOOO u won't be getting them buy your own he like I want yours so now four months later I'm far from where I was feeling better but STILL HURTING on so MANY LEVELS 🥺🥺😭😭...

My question is HOW LONG WILL THIS PAIN LAST 😭😭😭😭😭.

PLEASE PRAY FOR MY REMOVAL OF MY EX FROM MY MIND AND HEART FOREVER AS IM SO HEARTBROKEN 💔😭. AND PRAY FOR BIGGER HOUSE AND NEW HAPPY BEGINNINGS FOR ME AND MY KIDS...

BECAUSE THIS ROAD I'M ON IS HARD AND ROUGH AND I AM CONSTANTLY GOING THROUGH EMOTIONS DAILY AND PAIN

FEELING SO WEAK HURT ALONE AND STUPID 🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺😭😭😭😭...

BUT MY KIDS ARE HAPPY AND THAT'S WHAT KEEPS THE SUICIDAL THOUGHTS AWAY AS I'M DOING SOMETHING RIGHT TO SOME KIND OF DEGREE. 🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺...

post_text:
What do I miss the most after surviving what I have been through?
I miss the innocence I had.
Going someplace and feeling comfortable.
Not always wondering ‘when’.
Not purposely altering otherwise normal, every day things that everyone does, because I am so scared.
Going to the bathroom and not worrying that if I get caught in there unexpectedly, how will I defend myself.
I miss a causal walk in to the store instead of the intense paranoia and panic of who sees me... how will I be trapped... the millions doubts running through my head with every step.

I want my innocent security back.

post_text:
Hi moms! I need to vent. If this isnt approved you can remove it. I'm sorry! My daughters father wont respect my court ordered parenting plan. I only want an hour ahead to text me at the least and tell me he is coming before 630 cause her bedtime is 730. He hasn't respected it once. And now he is calling me horrible things and is very mean to me. I didn't even open the door tonight because it was 730 and she was asleep. But he thinks in lying. And wants to wake her.
How do I get him to respect us? Why wont he? What is wrong with men these days? I'm such a good person. Not perfect but would give you my last shirt off my back if you needed it. So I dont get why I have to tolerate this crap from him. Even with a court order.
I just dont get it! It makes me feel horrible. What do I do?! Advice??

post_text:
my name is Courtney. Really, life is crazy! And I'm trying. I'm a single mom. Of a beautiful smart little life saver. She's my everything. She is my reason to believe it gets better. So a few years ago I was with a man and he was on his way to come see me and got into a car accident and died, a few years before that I was with my first boyfriend ever he was very abusive. The only person that stuck up for me was my best friend. And he beat him up for it. We went home and then I got beat up for it (this was in 2013 so yeah I was young.) And later on that Sunday my best friend took his own life. So for years I blamed myself. For not leaving for thinking he would change. For the only person who tried to save me dying. And now I just got out of a relationship and it was so great at first. He was the first person I cared for in a while. He knew parts of me even I didn't know and he ended up using everything against me. He started beating me up. He threw me into walls, because he cheated on me. He threw fans at me. Pushed me up against walls with threats. Became my worst night mare. And my best dream. In the same sentence. An abusive relationship is so much more than just physical abuse.. It's being broken beyond any thought possible, my money was taken so I couldn't go do anything or move without him, my self esteem broken, my smile, my laugh, my soul, my family and friends were pushed away. I found a place I'm just trying to figure out the money. Please maybe point me in the right direction. All I ever wanted was to give my daughter everything, a better childhood than I had. And here i am screwing that all up. I'm failing at the one thing in life im supposed to make sure i succeed at. I don't even know where to start. I just want a second chance.. To start all over again and just be all about me and her.... And maybe eventually i can go back to college.. . I want to be the best me i can be for her.. Shes 3. Shes soaking everything up right now. I want her to know she can get through anything and in order to show her she can do that, i have to do that. And lately im not so sure i can.....that stereotype of a woman with a black eye, split lip or whatever is only a small part of the whole picture of abusive relationships. Domestic violence includes rape, sexual assault, robbery, and aggravated and simple assault by partners, immediate family members, or other relatives and friends. I lost everyone I feel like. The few friends I did have now want nothing to do with me i think because they are afraid of him? I'm not really sure. Im confused. So confused on how the people I love with my whole heart and soul can leave me out all alone when i need them the most... I am just looking for any kind of help i can get. I have tried so many different sites. It's been a month now. And im still trying to get help. I know of plenty of places for rent now its just getting a call back from one. Or being able to look at one. I also need assistance with security and first months rent and putting furniture in it... Thank u for ur time
Courtney
P.s. I'm from steuben county ny looking to live near dansville wayland cohocton area
Looking to be pointed in the right direction for maybe an advocate to help apply for Grant's answers such or help reach out about clothes, furniture, rent help for a new place etc. It gets exhausting telling my story again and again. P.s no one will help me find a place says I have to go into shelter then they will help. I don't want to stay with strangers. Trust is a huge problem for me.
P.s if a landlord can give me paperwork showing how much rent is so I have the right stuff to get help, i can probably be ready with the money to move in tomorrow. I so badly need an apartment. I miss my daughter so much. I dont want my daughter to walk in my footsteps. But I do want her to walk next to me, and even past me. Way further than I ever even dreamt possible. I want her to be the best little her she can be. And for that to happen i need to be the best me. And I feel like I'm not doing a good job right now. We just need a home so we can be back together.
I miss her so much. "We think sometimes that poverty is only being hungry, naked, and homeless. The poverty of being unwanted, unloved, and uncared for is the greatest poverty. We must start in our own homes to remedy this kind of poverty" – Mother Teresa

"Homelessness is not a choice, but rather a journey that many find themselves in."– Asa Don Brown
Okay yes. I was putting up with stuff I never should have. I was keeping my mouth shut about it. For months. But now I left. And I'm telling my story. I'm not going to let the fact that everyone left me behind because I choose to be loyal to what is right and not to a person because they are wrong. I'll always stand up for that and my right to be happy. I found myself. Now please help me find a home

post_text:
Trigger warning
abortion/Domestic Violence and swearing
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
Years ago I had an abortion of twins...
I woulda named them Mia and Jaylen.
The pain really never goes away...
It gets better in time.
I think about them everyday.
I had to fly to Honolulu, stay there for 36 hrs, obgyn app and procedure.
I was all by myself but I got through it.
To make matters worse the hospital where I had the abortion was the exact same hospital I was born in! That was some tough shit!
He'd tell me people disappear all the time on this little island called Kauai.
"There's no where for you to hide."
And he knew where the DV shelter was, he was right.
"You're nothing without me..."
When I finally left him he became nothing to me.
"You're not gonna find anyone like me..."
Omgee, REALLY!?!
He'd make my life a living hell if I left...
I didn't doubt that for a second!
We need to go back to the good old days, he'd say.
Break a woman's jaw she can't speak.
Break a woman's hand she can't write.
Come to find out his brother was in prison for breaking his girlfriends jaw! Oh I'm fucked!
When he was little and he misbehaved his hand was put on a hot burning stove.
He said he'd do the same to my son if he misbehaved.
He made my son throw away all of his toys because his room was messy.
While his pathetic, weak excuse of a mom did nothing!
My poor boy!
His room is such a mess!
To this day my son refuses to throw anything away.
Drives me NUCKN FUTS!!!
I caused that....
I wanted to die...
I wanted to kill myself....
because then and only then I knew my son would be safe away from him.
He's just like his father his mom would say.
Oh there's the cycle.
100% local boy, 100% Hawaiian...

post_text:
He was always a step ahead of me. Why? He planned everything from the beginning.

He made sure to discredit me by stealing my identity and trying to set me up for fraud

He made it seem like I was crazy by hacking me and stealing my social media accounts and sending himself messages posing as me.

He told people I was an escort...stealing my passport and ID...that way when human traffickers came to take me...no one would believe me.

Dangerous, cunning and methodical.

He didn't plan on me breaking into that locked trunk and finding out everything he did. He didn't plan on me taking screenshots of his passcode book and copying his files showing he's a video making pedophile who has been laundering money. post_text: The reality of the intense confusion I felt was...horrible. I didn't understand anything. I couldn't comprehend why everything that was happening to me was occurring. It didn't make sense to me. I thought I knew him. No one believes that someone they were with for years could be so utterly cruel. That fog lasted for months. With a lot of outside help, quiet introspection I finally came out of the swirling tornado of my mind. It was him. It was all him. The fog lifted. My abuser not only physically assaulted me, he cyberstalked me, stole my identity, had me raped, sold me to human traffickers, sold my sister to human traffickers. The videos and images were him sexually abusing children. The weird files were him selling child pornography, uploading them to the dark web, money laundering hundred of thousands of dollars from selling that crap, and had been sexually abusing our daughter and other children. He brainwashed me and beat me to keep me blind to what was happening. I never knew such evil could exist in this world until the fog lifted.

post_text: Good news! My abuser took a plea of 1 year jail, 1 year in rehab under formal probation and if he does not meet those or violates the protection order, he'll do 4 years in prison. I feel relieved not to have to testify in court. I feel happy, sad, some closure. I do finally feel ready to move on for the first time since it happened. I had worried if I had made the right choice to report him. But now that this is almost over (he still needs to have his formal sentencing) I do feel that I got justice and enough time to start over where he can't look for me and that I hope he takes advantage of the rehabilitation process that he's being given, but that is on him. He also has like 8 hours of batterer classes and some community service time and fines to pay. I do feel the system worked in my case. Now to focus on me and starting out fresh.

Good morning been up since 130 still in shock how crazy my day went yesterday first I woke up with a bad stomach ache like now 🥺🥺 and then 9am go to Walmart who do I see my ex who I believe followed me there as go figure 5 minutes after I pull up yeah I see him and then he parked off in the cut SMH making even more suspect to following me..... This is all after Monday 3-15-21 someone SMEARED poop on my van window... So something told me to.call the clerk of courts and when I do what so I find out the judge dismissed my CPO order 😡😡😡😡😡😡.

So okay I ask now why would he DISMISSED my order when I gave him the police reports of him breaking my rearview mirror on 1-2-21 how my ex and his white co-worker gf from Arby's was texting me he don't care what N...... Word you messing with just sit home and collect your government check as I am disabled from a previous domestic violence situation and my ex knows that's a sore thorn to me... But still let his racist gf say it to me...

Now mind you my narcissistic ex job is right next door to the police station so guess who they know and are familiar with my ex SMH as they basically when I saw the police report sugar coated it so it makes me sound off ex. The reports said I came in to file a report because my ex had cheated on her with his co-worker and I said that she said some bad words to me smdh bad words NIGER is more than some bad word 🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺 and I mentioned how he was following me in her van which he didn't even denie the judge must have just ignored that Lil tid bit or the fact of how someone broke in and wrote DIE on the walls in my house you know what they asked how do I know it was my ex smdh cuz UMMMM I don't have any enemies all I do is take care of my family nothing more nothing less SMH or the fact of how since he left in January he only messaged about the kids 5 times in January and then on 1-25-21 this van pulls up now mind u I've seen the van before but wasn't paying any attention really but on this specific day while I was with my oldest daughter the van pulls up really close beside me and who is it my ex SMH OMG this dude has been following me and for how long 🥺🥺🥺🥺 so I roll down my window and what does he say I need my shoes u bought me for Xmas cuz these shoes hurt my feet now me boy bye the shoes in the trash leave me alone he then sped off no mention how the kids or nothing I did say things must be good for him driving and things and he says ain't nothing good I'm like well u driving got a new hat u must be doing good and his attitude just intended and that's when. He sped off but when I turned his phone off my plan he then begins to call me from his racist gf phone 4 days straight in February 14,15,16,17 and broke in my house on the 18th which I don't even believe it was him I believe it was her texting me since she now has my number SMH so the 19th I got the temporary CPO order and then they said I had to see him again for him to plead his case and that was 3-4-21 so we go to court and I gave the judge the 5 Poli e reports I had about the incidents mention above and he says that he needed the weekend to decide I'm like for what he didn't denie anything but the breaking in the house now come on who else would do that but ok whatever there's still the police report about him breaking my rear view mirror and harrassing me... He then asked the judge could he give me something for our daughter birthday who just turned 7 I wasn't gonna take it as my domestic violence advocate with me said it's up to you and I told her she could grab it as I don't want any mail from him at my house as the CPO order is down and.i don't want him to feel like he could send me stuff

But see the police officers who eat at his job and know him sugar-coated the report like I was mad about him cheating and all he was doing was texting to check on his kids nothing more nothing less which was bullcrap so yeah sugar-coated the reports for him so when I called 3-17-21 since I haven't heard anything the clerk of courts said it was DENIED so now I'm like OMG no wonder he's coming around doing IGNORANT stuff and following me yet again cuz they lifted the order SMH...

Now what do I do so I don't have a CPO order which means he can now come back over to my neighbors house just to intimidate me even more he can follow and harrass me yet again I mean I don't get the court system at all her didn't denie anything but u still dismiss it what the heck.

Also u know what I don't get how does he feel like harassing me and things is cool when. He's the one that cheated that's on drugs as I believe he lost 60 pounds 6 months he even look skinnier when I saw him yesterday SMH but all I'm wondering is HOW HOW do you not take a look at the evidence at hand and grant a CPO order for years and instead dismiss it because what y'all go eat at his job SMH hopefully u don't get sick with his unsanitzed hands

Please oh please PRAY FOR AND WITH ME THAT GOD BLESSES ME WITH THE FINANCES I NEED TO MOVE AND GET NEW FURNITURE AND THINGS WHERE HE DOESN'T KNOW AND GET THE FRESH START ME AND MY KIDS NEED AND DESERVE

PRAY FOR ME 🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏 PLEASE.. . .

Jerry my son is two years old baby he has Congestive Heart Failure, it started when he was 2-4 months he had fever and shortened of breath, he can't and if he wants to breath is always very fast as if he is going to give up.
Jerry has been on drip and oxygen for the past two months now since on the 21/06/2020, it has not been easy buying oxygen because he can't breathe, and the doctor says that a corrective heart surgery would be done and it would cost #850,000 and to God and man me and my husband doesn't have such money to pay for the surgery, he is on oxygen 24/7 for now because that is the only option Left and we have been in the hospital for 2months now.
We are at: CRYSTAL SPECIALIST HOSPITAL 27B KUBWA ABUJA. Please if you are reading this right now.
To help please the cost of oxygen is #5,800 and #52,000 respectively please even if it is 24hrs oxygen because my son is at the point of death without oxygen, we had spent all we had and worked for even to eat is a problem please.
Jerry is my only son after 8 years of marriage and it hasn't been easy with me, I was mocked, kicked and restricted from touching any baby anytime we go to visit my husband family.
If God touches you and your heart to help my son Jerry please donate anything you have, you shall never lack, all what you wish shall be granted Amen🙏🙏

post_text: This may not seem like a big thing to someone who hasn’t been in an abusive relationship, big I got my husbands name off my home & car insurance. Both cars belong to me & are registered in my name. The insurance company was trying to force me to keep his name on the policies stating we are married & not yet divorced. So I went into detail about him being an abuser & that he is currently in jail for abusing & assaulting me with a fully loaded gun & that I have a criminal protective order. I told them I can provide proof that both cars are mine & that he is currently in jail with all the charges of DV. They responded no need we will be happy to help you. His name was immediately taken off my home policy & o had to fill out new paperwork for the car insurance that they usually mail only big they said they was making an exception & emailed them to me. A small step——but a BIG move.

post_text:
All I want to know is WHY WHY would he take me through all this when all I was doing was trying to keep my kids with him with both parents for so many years even after cheating twice and for what for him to end up cheating on me with a racist co-worker I let him use my van even though he didn't have his license I made sure when he didn't have cigarettes and money the week he didn't get paid I had his back I made sure that the $2900 in monthly bills and things were taken care of when he only gave me $200 a month and wanted to act like he was the man of the house and I even was willing to try and make it work for my kids with just that and he still cheats on me now

what woman would even consider accepting those circumstances at all probably not NONE but I did because of our kids I was willing to try anything to keep a two parent house and now that he's done this to me YET AGAIN I'm feeling BEYOND stupid as I wasted so many years it would have been 12 years 2-27-21 but the TRUST and the REAL LOVE has been gone since the first time he cheated back in 2015/16 but yet again I tried for our kids a second and this THIRD and final time was IT....

And now he wants to harass me and break into what use to be his home and traumatize our kids with writing the word DIE on the walls, or texting me with his racist gf texting me the N....word like it's cool for her to disrespect the mother of his kids like that or him pulling up on me and following me in her van which I didn't know what it was til one incident in January where he pulled up on me at McDonald's cuz he thought I had a guy in the van with me it was my daughter and he scared the crap out of us and u know what for to ask can he have the shoes I bought him for Xmas ummmm no SMH no mention of how the kids doing just where's my shoes I said u must be living the good life he them yell at me ain't s.... Good my feet hurt from these uncomfortable shoes and I want the shoes you bought me ummmm no and then sped off with a attitude I took him off my phone plan on 2-13 and what does he then do start harassing me from her phone SMH on the 14,15,16,17 and the 18th he didn't text or call the kids but maybe a handful of times in January oh and now he all of a sudden caring so much NO HIM AND HER WAS HARASSING ME THEN when he broke in 🥺🥺🥺🥺

So now I have a cpo and find out about the permanent one sometime this week if the judge will grant it so please keep me in your prayers that he does I need to move on so many levels as o don't feel safe in my home or outdoors anymore and always looking over my shoulder or for her van now this is no way to live so pray I can move my family very soon he is out here acting like he's the VICTIM yet again he would put a negative soon on the most positive thing I was blessed with $1000 in groceries for our family and you know what he said HOW IS THAT BENEFITING HIM SMH he surely did eat good out of that $1000 blessing I tell you that much.

IF it wasn't physically in his hand he had a problem even when I bought cigarettes and I don't even smoke but cuz I didn't give him the money that was a problem SMH but see I also believe he's on drugs now too as he lost 60 pounds in 5 months and was more irritable and everything he didn't even by his mom a gift for Xmas told me to put his name on the gifts I had for her from her grandkids SMH but then she's so naive to him he broke my rearview mirror on 1-2-21 and she said cuz I called the police o took it out of proportion like REALLY I should have let him come home with all that aggravating anger no I don't think so...

See when he's the one that caused all this DRAMA he's out here lying on me playing VICTIM and all I was doing was PROVIDING for my family making sure my kids wanted for nothing and were happy and my babies are happy thank God for that God has blessed me with the strength to provide for my family each and everyday and I'm forever BLESSED GRATEFUL and THANKFUL

post_text:
Hello I thought here I could tell my story my ex has caused me great suffering she got with me when I was facing 18 years in jail I took to heroin overdosed she covered me in dogfood and flour and posted it up on facebook then she realised i was actualy dieing she phoned an amblence she then got pregnant I owned my own house I gave up my benifits so she could move in she gained all her rent money from her old house she moved in but in the end I never went to jail I gave the heroin up that's when things got bad she stopped helping me with money I had nothing my mum had to start paying my bills she would beat me spit on me drove me out of my own home I had her arrested once but it all got to much for me her drinking was out of hand and I felt it was getting dangerous for our daughter to be around such violence so the police removed her that's when it got really bad she told everyone I was the abuser turned my whole town against me only a few friends stuck by me I turned to drugs Heroin I would receive messages telling me to overdose she had her friends ringing my mum saying all kinds of things I decided to hang myself but just when I was my mum walked in and stopped me and took me to hers the online abuse went on from her for months all her friends to she then thought of the idea of spreading false rumers with her friends I was a pedophile when this happend I decided I had had enough again so took a massive overdose my mum heard me fitting on the floor and had a naloxone needle in the house due to my adiction to heroin and saved me when I came round in the hospital I was so traumatised I had to be restrained the police were also called because I told them why I did it they went to talk to her and she said she would stop making the lies up I decided at that point I would get clean and fight for my daughter I got clean but when she got wind of this she started the lies again knowing it would drive me back to drugs where she knows I won't see my girl again well it didn't and I got an emergency restraining order put on her I now have to fight in court in 2 weeks to have this stick I have suffered so much abuse now if I loose I really don't know what to do and feel so alone and I miss my little girl so much she promised to fill her mind with poison till she hates me.
My mental health has never been good she knows that and exactly how to play it. There is so much more i have left out of this because it would be to long Any advice would be appreciated

post_text:
Please 🥺🥺🥺 PRAY FOR GOD TO REMOVE MY EX FROM MY MIND AND HEART 🥺🥺🥺🥺 and FOR MY STRENGTH AND PATIENCE TO CONTINUE BEING A GOOD MOTHER FOR MY KIDS

As I sat up here at 3am wondering WHY WHY would he do this to me for a THIRD time when I'm I told him SPECIFICALLY if you cheat on me and/or leave the door WILL NOT OPEN AGAIN....... And he does it but he CONSTANTLY wants to tell the world how he loves his kids oh so much so AGAIN I ask WHY would he put THEM through this separation mess AGAIN let ALONE myself... See my kids come FIRST and FOREMOST in my life and as their PARENT their MOM my life intentions is to make sure they are HAPPY and want for nothing their HAPPINESS comes before my own ALWAYS UNLIKE their dad see I have 6 kids and 3 of which are my narcissistic exes and throughout these 11&1/2 years the CHEATING the emotional and mental and physical ABUSE.... I don't get why I'm still taking this so HARD 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭.

I prepared myself to already expect this from him just in case it happened but my LOVE is so DEEP REGARDLESS of the expectations of him. I NEVER thought that this would happen in my life AGAIN 😓😓😓😓😓. I did everything and then some to make sure MY KIDS were HAPPY and then make sure he was HAPPY and it STILL wasn't enough... He didn't have money or cigarettes the week he didn't get paid here boo I got you, he had all the new games on the Xbox one, he had his favorite foods and snacks and things and he didn't want for anything and it STILL wasn't enough...

I have been through major surgeries in my life from my knee from a previous domestic violence situation to stomach surgery and back surgery so I have my good and bad days 😓😓😓😓😓. And that's why I made sure if I wasn't having a good day or feeling to good my KIDS as well as him still had their favorite quick fix meals to prepare.... And that STILL WASN'T ENOUGH.

Last year I noticed things changing about him between July and Xmas he lost 60 pounds and it wasn't no diet or healthy eating he was just losing weight and NOT looking right to me at all. His aggression towards me got worse he would take something positive and make it a NEGATIVE I got BLESSED with $1000 in groceries for Xmas for our then FAMILY of 8 u know what his response to that was how's that BENEFITING him SMH UMMMM maybe because it took down our $1800 grocery bill for the month and I was able to pay on other bills.... As he gave me $200 and said that made him the man of the house..... SMH now mind you the monthly expenses for our household EASILY comes to about $2750 without a doubt and he gave me $200 but see I was okay that wasn't even an issue because I NEVER DEPENDED ON A MAN TO TAKE CARE OF MY FAMILY I DEPEND ON GOD AND THAT'S WHO ALWAYS PROVIDES FOR ME AND MY KIDS ALWAYS...... But he NEVER even saw how THAT was something he NEVER was the man of the house or a father to our kids so why why did I try so hard to keep HIM he didn't spend time with the kids all he did was went to work came home smoked played game eat and sleep. So when I confronted him about CHEATING at work cuz that's all he says he does he denied it but 1-2-21 that was the FINAL DRAW as I called him at Arby's where he worked to tell him I had a surprise waiting for him at HOME to be ignored so I go to his job to talk and he just takes me to another level I asked for my keys to my van and said I'm done and before he even did it I asked him please don't throw the key at me and what does he do just THAT and he then takes it to another level and breaks the rearview mirror on the new van. So I call the police that just happened to be right next door to his job and they walk over and fill a police report out and I leave and he gave me the keys to my van and my house...... And then a week passes and what do I find out he's in a relationship with his white co-worker the day after this even WOW didn't waste ANYTIME did he ,😰😰😰😰😰. So okay fine u go ur way I'll go mine now weeks has passed and he pulls up on me in McDonald's to ask about some shoes I had bought him for Xmas now mind you I didn't get anything but still expecting me to continue to give give give after he's been CHEATING yet again SMH hell no bye then a week or so passes again and he then tells me if u want some of the refund or STIMULUS MONEY u gotta let me see the kids and entails mean see me and I'm NOT feeling that at all so UMMMM no so here we are 2-5-21 him and his white gf texting me and she says he doesn't give a f.... What NIGER you MESSING with and I say say what now and she says it again in different content and then said all I did was sit at home and collect my government check while he worked hard at Arby's SMH I sat on my butt collecting a government check as SHE wrote because I am disabled due to that past RELATIONSHIP that left me with a plate in my knee but anyways not going there 😰😰😰. And my ex knew how I had such low self-esteem about that situation but he would throw it in my face about my back surgery knee and stomach surgeries where I have my good and bad days and that HURT my heart so much but STILL I tried to stay a family for our KIDS but when he called me MONEY HUNGRY and ALL I EVER did was PROVIDE for my family that was it 2-13-21 I took him off the plan. Told him he was DEAD TO ME and if he wants to see the kids go through the courts as I NEVER want to see him again... 2-14,15,16,17 he starts texting me how da kids from the racist gf phone SMH like WOW leave me alone and go there the courts then on 2-18-21 while I was out he broke in the house and wrote DIE on several walls around the house NOW why would he traumatize our kids and scare them like that for me to have to answer a question why daddy want mommy to DIE 😓😓😓😓. How am I supposed to answer that. So 2-19-21 got a CPO ORDER AGAINST him which they then tell me I have to see him one last time on 3-4-21 AND I ASK WHY WHY DO I HAVE TO SEE HIM... I NEVER WANT TO SEE HIM AGAIN 😭😭😭 and they said to hear his side I'm like so he can lie since he's such a compulsive LYING bastard but I have police reports to prove these things. SMH so okay whatever. He's driving past my house he even had the audacity to come to my neighbor house just to intimidate me. I got a text he received his income tax money and things I could have been ignorant and took it all out his account but I didn't touch one cent..... He will get his KARMA oh yeah especially after finding out that even though I ONLY collect SSI income I can claim the kids that I'm PROVIDING and taking care of so that income tax STIMULUS MONEY he got for the kids this last time I'm claiming them all and his tax REFUND will be reversed and he'll owe back pay and that's on HIM.... So he better enjoy the bachelor cheating racist gf dating life while he can cuz KARMA is a MUTHA....... because he knows how hard it is with taking care of our autistic son who's 11 yrs old and weighs 260 pounds and 6ft 2 inches tall in adult diapers he knows it's a challenge EVERYDAY and he said he got tired of helping me change him but he's our son 😰😰😰😰😰😰😰😰. So it has to be done and that's what I'll do as long as needed. This is so unfair on so MANY LEVELS. But I know THROUGH it ALL with God's strength and patience and PROTECTION AROUND ME. I can overcome any battle..... BECAUSE I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me... AMEN.

So I COME ASKING FOR PRAYERS to remove Tyrell from my mind and my heart.........

post_text:
TW: abuse

If you’ve read all my other posts you’ll know what I’m talking about.
I asked my Mum, why aren’t you kicking out my brother? You said you would 6 times.
You gave him so many chances.
We live in an area that has no covid cases either and we are not required to where masks so that’s not an excuse.
You kicked me out in the middle of my senior year, year 12 because of big mistakes I made.
None of those mistakes were physical abuse.
She said well because I knew you could look after yourself and I don’t think he could if I kicked him out. He’s also just been kicked out by his father from his fathers house so I don’t want to kick him out too. I don’t think he could emotionally handle that.

You kicked me out in the middle of year fucking 12. I had to live in a homeless shelter for a week on the other side of my city from where my school is.

I eventually moved back in with my Dad until the end of school, and then back in with my Mum.

I feel so stupid for having not moved out yet.
This has been happening for years.

I was 17 at the time.
My brother is 16.

And you won’t kick him out for physically abusing me?
Stuff you’ve seen.

She says oh well you do provoke it.
And today you started it .
I swear you guys this was the 1 day I started it.
I told him I wasn’t letting him inside after he got home from school.
He climbed through the dog door.
He then came inside screamed about how it was all my fault our Mum took the wifi away.
I confronted him and told him I’m not taking his shit anymore.
I was seething.
I have copped this shit for so many years.
And it is has got astronomically worse in the last month since my brother has been living with us full time.
I hit him.
I shouldn’t of fucking done that.
Because I can’t hit. It was a pussy slap.
He came back 10 times harder and he took my phone.
He grabbed me by the collar and split my shirt again.
I took his phone.

He pegged an avocado at my head and it hit the TV and splattered everywhere.

He got the belt and slapped me with it.
Not with the buckle fortunately. He’s done that before.

I have done this too him 1 time and this is what I get.
It turned around and used on me.

When my Mums home I sure do provoke him.
Because I want her to see what he does to me behind closed doors, when she’s at work.

She doesn’t give a shit about me.

She says well if it’s really that bad, Blake why don’t you just move out?!!
Your 19!

I am trying to get a job I am.
I want out.

This has hurt me so much today, emotionally.
My brothers not in his senior year.
Kick him out.
He’ll eventually come around and come back and beg and say he’ll follow all the rules.
You Mum kicked me out when I needed to have a stable place to live, most.

You’ve just proven you care more for him and his well-being that mine.
My well-being today.
And my well-being 1 1/2 years ago when you kicked me out.

I told you (after the police got involved) that my brother had been touching me on the breasts inappropriately for a number of months.
You didn’t believe me.
When my guidance councillor told the police you didn’t believe me.
My Dad doesn’t believe me.

Maybe it’s because I’m overweight I don’t know.
Or because he’s younger.

My Dad said “if this actually happened, Blake you could of stopped him, you’re twice his size”

Yeah not in height.
I’m just a big girl.

Why does know one give a shit.

I have no family and no friends.
