post_text:
TW: incestual groping, domestic violence

-
-
-
-
-

Does anyone else’s Mum ignore or not believe the abuse their daughters face from their brothers?

My Mum doesn’t give a fuck.
She sees my brother kick me and punch me and yells BLAKE before she yells HENRY.
Basically telling me that it was my fault for not walking away.
The other day my brother smacked me across the head because I sat and ate cereal next to him.
I took his phone to punish him because I know my Mum was going to do fuck all when she got home.
He then grabbed me by the collar and tore my shirt in half (exposing my breasts)
I don’t think he did intentionally to expose me but it was just to be mean.
I have a cut on my neck from the fabric burn as he’s done this too 3 of my other shirts in the last 3 weeks.
My Parents are divorced. Our Dad is very toxic and kicked my brother out. We also have a younger sister who lives with us every second week.
My brother is 16 and I am 19.
My Dad doesn’t care either.
He started talking about my breasts, years ago, how big they are and stuff.
He then started coming up behind me and hugging me and touching them.
He also whipped me with a belt for turning his PlayStation off (he gets aggressive after playing video games as he has a diagnosed gaming addiction). I turned it off because I knew my Mum wasn’t going to do anything.
That stuff ^^ all happened in 2019.
I told someone on a Facebook group and they emailed my guidance officer who called the police.
The police didn’t believe me.
They said you have a nice house, food on the table and people who love you and left.
My Mum didn’t believe me.
I don’t think she wants to be a parent anymore.
Tonight, my brother was being really mean.
He said he would give me the HDMI cord because I wanted to watch a movie.
I waited for hours for him to get off his video games for his bed time, eagerly waiting to watch my movie and my brother mocked me and said nope you can’t have it and that he was not going to give our Mum his PlayStation like he usually does when it’s bedtime. I got really upset (I’m so emotionally exhausted that this was just the only thing I wanted to do, just watch that movie) that he led me on to believe that he was going to give it to me.
And then he pushed me and kicked me and punched me in the tummy.
Not that hard no.
Not enough to leave marks.
He never does.
And my Mum was watching.
She rolled her eyes and went to her bedroom and locked the door.
She doesn’t care.
I sat outside crying hysterically.
Not because of the silly HDMI cord but because of the years of not believing me.
Of being treated differently.
Or being expected to do more.
She sat inside silent and then finally after 10 minutes told me I was going to wake the neighbours. She told me to come in and I poured my heart out.
And she said, “leave it with me”
LEAVE IT WITH ME???

What is there too think about??

10 days ago you said to Henry if he hits me again he will be kicked out.
7 days ago he ripped my shirt.
He gets another chance.
3 days ago he ripps another one of my shirts and shatters glass all over my room on purpose by smashing a empty coconut oil jar.
Tonight he kicks and hits me and you do nothing.
He torments me.
He uses the exact same phrases and analogies our Dad uses.
Do you want to raise another Dad, Mum?
So another poor woman like you, has to marry our Dad, in Henry’s form??
He gaslights me to know end.
He’s bloody 16!!
How does he know how to do that.
While i’m crying in my room just from the sheer exhaustion and sadness he yells
“Are you seriously crying about an HDMI cable?”
“ This is all your fault Blake”
“ This is all your fault, you’re just a fat ugly bitch and no one likes you”

For the record I’m not crying about the HDMI cable. I’m crying because that’s all I have. I just wanted to watch my movie. A movie called, 10 things I hate about you.
That was going to help me imagine how I should actually be treated by people.
That was going to help me imagine what my teenage years could of been like (I know it’s romanticised) if I wasn’t dealing with the fallout of my parents divorce. For years being a supplementary wife for my Dad and letting him trauma dump on me for hours.
He’d tell me to get in the car and we’d go driving for hours just so he could tell me about all his grievances with his work partners and my Mum. And then the night she left was a big thing. I was 15. She took my sister. My brother was at a sleepover. And she left me. I didn’t want to go because I was brainwashed by him that she was the sole “bad guy”
He weeped in my lap (10 nights before, when she actually said she was leaving)
Back to the night she left.
I was with my Dad by ourselves in our house.
And after she left (on their wedding anniversary at the exact time they got married) he printed out photo copies of parenting books. Hundreds of them. And plastered them with tape all over the walls. He was like crazy.
I just wanted to watch this fucking movie to watch what it might of been like to be a normal teenager. Not a stupid 19 year old virgin whose never even held hands with a boy.
Who went to 2 parties in her teenage years.
Who never even snuck out because she was a loser and had no friends or no where to go.
Who wasn’t parenting her parents.
I just wanted to watch my fucking movie.

Fast forward to today.
I’ve been living with my Mum more regularly for the past 4 ish years since she left.
Even though she’s toxic, he is more outright toxic. And it’s more stable here.
That’s until my brother moved in full time with us.
I have been living with my Mum full time for about a year now.
I just turned 19 a couple weeks ago.
I graduated high school in November 2019.
I hate myself for not moving out sooner.
This fucking family has been toxic for years and I haven’t even moved out yet.
I’m now applying to heaps of jobs and trying to get out of here. The last couple of weeks have even the final straw.
I’m so lost.

I wish my Mum cared.
She even said to me once.
“Well Blake, you do know you overreact when he hits you”

This is the woman with the lowest pain tolerance I know.

My Dad said to me
“If Henry actually did that too you, you could of stopped him because your like double his weight and size”

He’s taller than me now.

I still talk to my Dad and the thing is he’s smart as a whip. He seems like a rare breed. An emotionally mature man? Huh?
But really he’s manipulative as fuck.
He’s even tricked family therapists and my psychologists before.
I’ve talked to him about this stuff but he tends to just put all the blame on my Mum.

I feel like a fraud.
Why does no one give a shit.

And no I’m not going to a shelter.
And I’m not going on welfare.
This is not going to kill me. Like some other women’s abuse will.
I will get a job.
And I will get out.

I am just so fucking tired.
It’s been 4 years.
I was 14 when this all really started.

post_text:
THIS YEAR....

Has been such a traumatic experience that I did not see coming no way no how.....

I have 6 kids and three of whom are with my narcissistic ex and the things he's been DOING breaking into the house writing DIE on the walls, breaking my rearview mirror, letting his cheating with white gf text me NIGER COMMENTS,and following me and pulling up on me in McDonald's parking lot to ask about some shoes NOT the kids how are they doing some shoes I bought for Xmas ummm GONE...

See as I am now feeling unsafe at home with all these crazy ACTIONS he's doing I'm torn because my autistic son is in school as that structure is needed for him to maintain. So I'm trying to still figure out how to do this and keep my family safe 😰😰😓😓😓😓. I never in a million years would have ever thought I would be going through something like this...

My son schooling is a major thing and keeping me at a neutral and I don't know what to do. I have to go to court next Thursday to get the 5 year CPO ORDER granted. And I'm so torn and heartbroken as 11&1/2 years just gone wasted for me thinking of my kids and trying to let them have a two parent family when I should have let him stay gone the first time he cheated but the THIRD time was ENOUGH.......

I go to court on 3-4-21 and then. I should be able to have a clearer idea on my next MOVE to some degree..... I don't really know what to do with all of this I'm going through. I'm so at a LOST.😰😰😰😰😰😰😰

I tried and tried and this HURT I did NOTHING WRONG NOTHING AT ALL but try to PROVIDE for my family and keep THEM HAPPY my kids are HAPPY through all of this and that is STILL a major factor. I am blessed and grateful for....

Please keep me and my family in your prayers...

Have a blessed rest of the week.

post_text:
I’m so exhausted
My brother hit me over the head today because I ate a bowl of cereal next to him while he was watching TV.
No one else was home.
I took his phone until he apologised. It’s my only vice.
He didn’t like that.
He grabbed the collar of my shirt and ripped it in half so hard it cut my neck.
He then was screaming and screaming and screaming and eventually grabbed my phone and his and barricaded himself in the room of the house with a deadbolt and stayed in there for an hour.
He then proceeded to call out Mum on the phone and tell her “she hit me first”
“She’s honestly such a bitch psychopath Mum, she was just trying to annoy me by eating cereal” “she’s such a fat fuck, mum”

Anytime he came out of the room after that he had a cricket bowl and a belt to threaten me with. I grabbed a golf stick for protection.

Then when our Mum gets home from work his story changes.
Oh well yes Mum I did actually hit her first.
I can’t even hit him.
He’s too big.

He starts crying knowing he’s been caught out telling a lie.
I’ve taken his phone at this point.
I know it’s the only thing I’ve got to insight change around here.
He’s addicted to it.
He’s been diagnosed with a gaming addiction.
He gets so violent after gaming.

He’s so angry I’ve got his phone.

I go out for a couple of hours.
I come home.
My room has been ransacked again.
He’s looking for his phone.
He finds my vibrator from the other day.
Clothes are everywhere.

I run into his room yelling he punches and kicks me as I take his iPad and his mouse.

I don’t give a fuck anymore.

He comes into my room and smashes a empty coconut oil glass jar on the ground.
I now have glass in crevices of my room.

I know I probably deserved what was coming today.
I took his phone and his stuff.
But I am so fucking sick of this shit.

He’s ripped a total of 4 shirts of mine in the last 2 weeks.

Is it bad that I just want to punch him?
I just want to pin the duck head down and deck him.
He hits me everyday.
He degrades me.
He pulls out his shirt to make it look like a fat belly to show how fat I am.

When he hits me today he says “ this all wouldn’t of happened if you had just listened”

He sounds just like our father who doesn’t live with us.
Some of the phrases he says sound so similar it’s eery.

Here’s some of the things he says in our altercations.

This is all your fault Blake
You’re a psychopath Blake
If you had just done what I’d said this wouldn’t of happened
You’re such a bitch
You’re a fat cunt
You have no friends
You are a fat piece of shit
Mum, your daughters a psychopath

I’m so done.
I’ve applied to over 20 jobs now and nothing!
I have McDonalds experience!
I haven’t even got an interview yet.
I just want out.

There’s no one else in my area I can stay with.

This is the fucking fall out of a marriage breakdown.
It’s been nearly 4 years.

Angry boys.
And I’m angry too.

post_text:
a word from Jerry's mom

PLS PARENTS OR PARENTS TO BE DONT SKIP THIS PRAYER FOR MY SON PLEASE, YOUR PRAYER IS ALL WE NEED BECAUSE IT WILL HELP IN SAVING MY SON'S LIFE.
I am writing this in tears and I request only one seconds of your precious time to pray for my son (Jerry David)and also help me financially please.
Jerry my son is two years old baby he has Congestive Heart Failure, it started when he was 2-4 months he had fever and shortened of breath, he can't and if he wants to breath is always very fast as if he is going to give up.
Jerry has been on drip and oxygen for the past two months now since on the 21/06/2020, it has not been easy buying oxygen because he can't breathe, and the doctor says that a corrective heart surgery would be done and it would cost #850,000 and to God and man me and my husband doesn't have such money to pay for the surgery, he is on oxygen 24/7 for now because that is the only option Left and we have been in the hospital for 2months now.
We are at: CRYSTAL SPECIALIST HOSPITAL 27B KUBWA ABUJA. Please if you are reading this right now.
To help please the cost of oxygen is #5,800 and #52,000 respectively please even if it is 24hrs oxygen because my son is at the point of death without oxygen, we had spent all we had and worked for even to eat is a problem please.
Jerry is my only son after 8 years of marriage and it hasn't been easy with me, I was mocked, kicked and restricted from touching any baby anytime we go to visit my husband family.
If God touches you and your heart to help my son Jerry please donate anything you have, you shall never lack, all what you wish shall be granted Amen🙏🙏

PRAYERS OR SUPPORT
+2348164941126
ACCOUNT NAME: EMMANUEL GRACE
ACCOUNT NUMBER:1432808028
BANK NAME: ACCESS BANK

post_text:
Why me......

People say that KARMA will come to those that do WRONG this is the THIRD time he's done me WRONG like this and he NEVER gets nothing but the easy route as I'm THE ONLY ONE changing our autistic son who's 11 yrs old and wears adult diapers being 260 pounds and wearing a size 15 men's shoe I'm the one continuously PROVIDING and spending time with our kids as he's just out here living the bachelor life with no responsibility I'm the one trying to stay positive when all I wanna do is breakdown and cry as he wasn't a provider or helper REALLY at all with his $200 and FEELING so damn stupid for trying so long to be a two parent family for OUR KIDS that I ALWAYS put FIRST AND FOREMOST as to him they're ALWAYS last on his list for anything he didn't spend anytime with them he went to work cheated came home played the video game which he could have played the game with them even EASILY as I bought everyone their own Xbox one he just needed to find time to play with them which he NEVER did even bought the kids the same game he was playing and he STILL didn't make time I mean what else could I have done to try and make him spend time with his KIDS my goodness NOTHING.......

And then Thursday he wants to break in the house and right DIE on the walls in three of the rooms and one being the kids room so I could know he was upstairs next to my bedroom I guess SMH....

How is THIS fair at ALL..... I'm doing everything and then some for my KIDS as I will ALWAYS because they COME FIRST AND FOREMOST in my life...

But how is it fair that YET AGAIN he's out here ACTING like he has no responsibilities...

And to call me MONEY HUNGRY when all I do is try to provide for my family my 6 kids and myself I try my DAMNEDEST to make sure my KIDS are HAPPY and have their favorite foods and luxuries and not want for anything... But the ONLY thing he cared about having was his video games, cigs and weed that's it NOTHING else matter and now I believe he's on more than just those things as he lost 60 pounds in 5 months just takes it to a whole NUTHA level..

Then the last but not least he would say all I do is go to work and come home.. SO I said are you CHEATING with someone at work he denied it and what did I find out on 1-2-21 he broke my rearview mirror and threw the key in my face and was CHEATING with his white Co-worker now gf he's in a relationship with but that's not the icing on the cake. This is she was texting me for him and TOLD me at least 3 times I can recall seeing the word NIGER as he defended her and said it was him autotexting SMH so I knew that was a LiE cuz when you autotext and say that word you get this ******** so yeah you have to manually type that word out and he didn't see any WRONG with her typing this IGNORANCE to the mother of three of his KIDS and DISRESPECTING me as opposed to DISRESPECTING his own race SMDH.

Now I'm waking in the middle of the night 3-5 times because of his IGNORANCE of breaking in on Thursday even though I changed the locks and all still no longer feeling safe and HOW IS ANY OF THIS FAIR...

😭😭😭😭🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺

post_text:
At 240am a car sat on in front of my house for 20 minutes. I was scared so I called the police..

It wasn't him but see I gotta move..

Look how it has me so jumpy as they were just some guys chilling in their car but then again my narcissistic ex could have had someone do that to make me seem paranoid too.... SMH and no one was arrested... I have to move or I'm not going to have any more peaceful nights.

What makes this even more sadder he's doing all of this craziness the weekend of our daughter birthday... Today is my daughter vona birthday she was a twin I had lost one the first 5&1/2 weeks of pregnancy and they weren't really gonna treat vona as a pregnancy cuz they thought I may have been losing her too... Because I was going through stress and things with my now ex who is her dad back in 2014 even 🥺🥺🥺🥺. But God that's all I can say and I went in to the hospital on Valentine's day 2014 and they tried to keep her in as long as they could as she wasn't due til April 🥺🥺. But 6 days later on 2-20-14 they had to take her out as I was having complications..... But she survived after being 2 months premature and all 7 year's later nobody I mean NOBODY can't tell me it wasn't for GOD'S STRENGTH and PROTECTION over me that my baby girl is here and strong and wonderful as ever.

I celebrated her birthday yesterday at Chuck e cheese so less crowds in the pandemic but also because I was gonna let her dad see her till he started all this extra foolishness last Saturday and he knew I was going there on her birthday so I just went a day earlier just in case he tried to come 😁. I don't ever want to see HIM EVER..... I'm hoping that when I go to court on the 4th that would be my last time ever being in the same room.. until he goes to court and tries to get supervised visits as I'm DONE he's DEAD TO ME.... Paying $387 a month child support is not anything when I have his son wearing a size 15 men's shoe and 260 pounds and a grocery bill monthly of $1800-$2000 trying to provide my kids their favorite foods and things... and I'm a disabled mom so that's half the income gone right there and still gotta pay rent,gas,lights,cable,phone,van gas,van insurance, van note, and neccessities and medicine not covered by insurance....

And he does THIS to me for the THIRD and FINAL TIME... So yeah he's DEAD TO ME he wants to see the kids go through the courts as I NEVER EVER want to see his face in front of me EVER AGAIN. And I PRAY on 3-4-21 would be the last time I do see him face to face to finalize my CPO ORDER for 5 years... I don't EVER want to see his DISRESPECTING UNAPPRECIATIVE WORTHLESS UNGRATEFUL DEADBEAT SELF EVER AGAIN..

What took me over was the CHEATING yet again, then the N...... Word from his white gf, the emotional and mental abuse calling me a cripple or downing me being able to do as much as I use to because of all the surgeries back,knee,stomach.. I've been through and how I'm limited to do things simple cleaning and cooking even at times, but what took the icing on the cake was him calling MONEY HUNGRY as I've been the one PROVIDING for THIS FAMILY the whole 11&1/2 years I'M THE ONE PAYING AND PAID ALL THE BILLS AND PROVIDING FOR THIS FAMILY even making sure he had cigarettes and a couple dollars and HE HAS THE AUDACITY TO CALL ME MONEY HUNGRY FOR TRYING TO PROVIDE FOR MY FAMILY AND KEEP MY KIDS HAPPY THAT'S ALL I DO AND HIM CALLING ME THAT WAS THE LAST DRAW...

HE'S DEAD TO ME...

SO PRAY FOR THE REMOVAL OF MY NARCISSISTIC EX FROM MY MIND AND HEART.

post_text:
At 240am a car sat on in front of my house for 20 minutes. I was scared so I called the police..

It wasn't him but see I gotta move..

Look how it has me so jumpy as they were just some guys chilling in their car but then again my narcissistic ex could have had someone do that to make me seem paranoid too.... SMH and no one was arrested... I have to move or I'm not going to have any more peaceful nights.

What makes this even more sadder he's doing all of this craziness the weekend of our daughter birthday... Today is my daughter vona birthday she was a twin I had lost one the first 5&1/2 weeks of pregnancy and they weren't really gonna treat vona as a pregnancy cuz they thought I may have been losing her too... Because I was going through stress and things with my now ex who is her dad back in 2014 even 🥺🥺🥺🥺. But God that's all I can say and I went in to the hospital on Valentine's day 2014 and they tried to keep her in as long as they could as she wasn't due til April 🥺🥺. But 6 days later on 2-20-14 they had to take her out as I was having complications..... But she survived after being 2 months premature and all 7 year's later nobody I mean NOBODY can't tell me it wasn't for GOD'S STRENGTH and PROTECTION over me that my baby girl is here and strong and wonderful as ever.

I celebrated her birthday yesterday at Chuck e cheese so less crowds in the pandemic but also because I was gonna let her dad see her till he started all this extra foolishness last Saturday and he knew I was going there on her birthday so I just went a day earlier just in case he tried to come 😁. I don't ever want to see HIM EVER..... I'm hoping that when I go to court on the 4th that would be my last time ever being in the same room.. until he goes to court and tries to get supervised visits as I'm DONE he's DEAD TO ME.... Paying $387 a month child support is not anything when I have his son wearing a size 15 men's shoe and 260 pounds and a grocery bill monthly of $1800-$2000 trying to provide my kids their favorite foods and things... and I'm a disabled mom so that's half the income gone right there and still gotta pay rent,gas,lights,cable,phone,van gas,van insurance, van note, and neccessities and medicine not covered by insurance....

And he does THIS to me for the THIRD and FINAL TIME... So yeah he's DEAD TO ME he wants to see the kids go through the courts as I NEVER EVER want to see his face in front of me EVER AGAIN. And I PRAY on 3-4-21 would be the last time I do see him face to face to finalize my CPO ORDER for 5 years... I don't EVER want to see his DISRESPECTING UNAPPRECIATIVE WORTHLESS UNGRATEFUL DEADBEAT SELF EVER AGAIN..

What took me over was the CHEATING yet again, then the N...... Word from his white gf, the emotional and mental abuse calling me a cripple or downing me being able to do as much as I use to because of all the surgeries back,knee,stomach.. I've been through and how I'm limited to do things simple cleaning and cooking even at times, but what took the icing on the cake was him calling MONEY HUNGRY as I've been the one PROVIDING for THIS FAMILY the whole 11&1/2 years I'M THE ONE PAYING AND PAID ALL THE BILLS AND PROVIDING FOR THIS FAMILY even making sure he had cigarettes and a couple dollars and HE HAS THE AUDACITY TO CALL ME MONEY HUNGRY FOR TRYING TO PROVIDE FOR MY FAMILY AND KEEP MY KIDS HAPPY THAT'S ALL I DO AND HIM CALLING ME THAT WAS THE LAST DRAW...

HE'S DEAD TO ME...

SO PRAY FOR THE REMOVAL OF MY NARCISSISTIC EX FROM MY MIND AND HEART.

As I'm up here dealing with stomach pains and wondering why he did this to me and then what took me over first was the use of the N...... Word with his white gf and then secondly he calls me MONEY HUNGRY and was like trying to dangle the STIMULUS MONEY over me to get what he wanted eventho I should be the one entitled to it because I am the one taking care of all these kids ... I'm MONEY HUNGRY because I want to make sure my kids have a roof over their heads food in their bellies and all the neccessities that's needed lights,gas,water,cable, internet, phone,van, insurance amongst other things.... And I'm MONEY HUNGRY he gave me $200 and said that made him the man of the house 🤷🏿‍♀️🤷🏿‍♀️🤷🏿‍♀️🤷🏿‍♀️🤷🏿‍♀️🤷🏿‍♀️. I don't know how when rent is $780. Oh before I FORGET to mention. I called IRS guess who qualifies to claim the KIDS....ME 😁.

And now he wants to be out here playing the VICTIM as he was the one CHEATING with a co-worker... So this narcissistic is trying to find a way to put the blame on me as ALL I EVER did was try to keep my kids HAPPY first and foremost and then make sure he was happy which entails made me HAPPY... But I wasn't with my OWN HAPPINESS at ALL.., so whomever will listen to his STORY and LIES of how he's the VICTIM and I'm the bad guy yet again eventho he's living with her now driving her van pulling up on me and coming to my house on IGNORANCE when he doesn't see my van which means im gone

But I'm the one taking care of his three kids with me as well as my other three kids. He works at Arby's and get a free meal everyday then wants to say he didn't come home to a cooked meal even though when I wasn't feeling good I provided fast food or their favorite quick meals to eat.. SMH but again he gets a free meal at Arby's everyday 🤷🏿‍♀️🤷🏿‍♀️🤷🏿‍♀️🤷🏿‍♀️🤷🏿‍♀️🤷🏿‍♀️.

So as I am a disabled mom due to domestic violence that left me with a plate in my knee. I'm unable to work but I STILL MANAGE to MAINTAIN THE HOUSEHOLD NEEDS....

He had his own Xbox 55 inch TV when he was out of cigarettes I had his back when he was out of money gave him a couple dollars so he wasn't BROKE...

AND THIS THE THANKS I GET AFTER 11&1/2 YEARS ON AND OFF.... DEALING WITH HIS CHEATING, HARRASSING ME, breaking into my house writing DIE on the walls in different places. SO PLEASE KEEP ME IN PRAYERS AND ASK GOD TO REMOVE MY EX FROM MY MIND AND HEART...

AND HIM AND HIS IGNORANT GF GET THE KARMA THEY DESERVE....

post_text:
My Closing Argument in court today...it’s long, but appreciate the read! Children’s names have been changed to Daughter or Son.

Your honor

You said something the very first day of trial that hit me like an arrow to my chest. You said this case needs finality. I have stated to mediators, Placer County Judges and other professionals along this journey, that I just want my life back. After contemplating on what you stated, I realized what I wanted was finality and a clear view of the future.

I feel I have painted a clear picture to the courts of what is happening in this case. My story has stayed consistent since my filing in May of 2019. I believe my children and I are all victims of domestic violence. I believe that the woman who have testified in this trial, are all victims of domestic violence.

I believe that most of them, haven’t a clue as to what it means to be a victim of domestic violence, including (My Ex). I think about the future trauma that Daughter will go through after participating in this trial. I do not believe she understands the possible ramifications mentally she may have exposed herself to, in making this decision as a soon to be 21 year old woman.

I believe I have possibly caused some of these issues for her as well, when I was drinking. I have asked her to participate in counseling numerous times, without prevail. I worry that with being a victim herself of domestic violence at such a young age, that without help, she will travel down the same path I have.

My son, (Son) knows I absolutely adore him and always have! I wonder what it has done to his psyche and how it will affect future relationships with women, to make the decision to completely cut his mother out of his life. I worry his anger issues will be a detriment to him, like (My Ex) in future relationships and life in general. I have asks Son to start counseling numerous times, with no prevail.

Daughter to be so angry at such a young age and suffering from possible mental health issues, is detrimental at her age. Children that have been taught to hate a parent have higher suicide rates and are more likely to end up in the criminal court system. I regret being a bad example to Daughter and my other children while drinking. I have worked hard to maintain my sobriety this year, with going through a Global Pandemic to losing Son.

You were suppose to hear from my ex’s (Ex). Your honor I believe she is a victim of domestic violence. I believe she is today where I was in October 2017, when I withdrew my filing that initiated court. I believe that she herself will find herself in my shoes in the near future.

Son Is my whole heart. Over the last 3 years I have spent almost everyday with him. I have made it the most important job in my life to shelter the innocence that child has and just let him be a kid. I ask the courts to take into consideration what it does to a young child to be ripped from his mother’s care twice and completely isolated. I spent 3 weeks without speaking to Son and then another 4 weeks. This is the period in which the behaviors explained in this court room, my (My Ex) and through testimony of witnesses, took place. I ask the courts to consider, could that be why there was a sudden change of behavior? His entire life changed the second (My Ex) picked him up.

Mediators reports clearly state that the children have way to much knowledge of the family law case. I ask the courts to take into consideration, who the children have primarily lived with during the previous court proceedings.

Finally your honor I would ask that the courts take into consideration the women that have testified in this trial. Can we all tell the same story and it not be real? At the end of the day, there is only one common denominator in everyone’s testimony in this trial. That common denominator is My Ex!

I’ll rest with this, every court date I’ve had with My Ex since our domestic, my heart races, my palms sweat, I have tremendous anxiety. My body reacts with the response that it is in fear. I am asking the courts to rule in my favor and return Son to my custody and provide finality to this case, so we do not have to return to the courts. In closing your honor I am asking for finality.

I would like to thank you your honor for presiding over this case. This trial has allowed me to finally stand up against my abuser. I no longer view myself as a victim, I now see myself as a survivor.

My brother found my vibrator in the bathroom when he got home from school because I forgot to put it back in my room.
I live at home and am 19.
He is 16.
Our Mum was at work still.
He kept on running around with it and not giving it to me.
I convinced him that it was a massager.
He then said that he used it to pleasure himself.
He then came in my room and looked in my cupboard and said that I had Vaseline lip balm to use for lube.
He then again reminded me he pleasured himself with it.
He went away and then said well if it’s not and it’s actually a vibrator don’t use it because you could get pregnant because I used it.

If you’ve read my posts before you’ll see that he hits me everyday.
I feel like a faker because I’m not left with bruises.
He’ll hold me by my hair while he punches me and kicks me.
I feel like a terrible person because right now and for a long time all I’ve wanted to do is just do it back to him, just pin him down and fucking deck him.
But I can’t do it.
I don’t know how to fight.
I slapped him the other day and he came at me 10 times harder.
My Mum told me once, “oh well you do have to admit, Blake you do overreact when he hits you”
He hasn’t for the last couple of days because my Mum threatened him.
6 days ago she said to him if he hits me again he’ll be thrown out.
3 days ago he hit me again, and he got another chance.
In the last week, he’s grabbed me by the collar twice and torn 2 of my shirts.
She said he got another chance because when I stole money from her years ago I got multiple chances.
I didn’t physically hurt anyone.
I still shouldn’t of stolen money, I know.
So he’s not hitting me at the moment.

And you’ll see there’s been instances of weird sexual things. Like him touching me on on my breasts years ago and talking about how big they are.
Sometimes even in front of my Mum.
She laughed once, saying “ew that’s your sister hahah!”
He doesn’t do that anymore but he still hits me and insults me everyday.

He pulls his shirt out to look like a big belly and tells me how disgusting and fat I am.

He’s really angry at me all the time since my guidance councillor involved the police about the stuff I was telling her he was doing.
He completely denies any of the weird touching.
My parents don’t care and they think I’m lying saying if it really happened I could of stopped it because I’m fat and “double his size”

I’m so lost.
Like it’s so fucking weird all the shit he’s pulling.

After this whole vibrator thing happened this afternoon I went out for a couple of hours.
I came back and my room had obviously been searched though. All my wardrobe drawers were open. A jar from my cupboard was on my desk. My bedside table drawer was open.
My Mum said she didn’t do it.
Was he looking for the vibrator?
What for?

It’s just so gross and weird.
I think he’s really sexually repressed.
But I mean aren’t we all?
Like shouldn’t he just sort this out himself?

It was my fault for leaving it in the bathroom.
But he literally could of just left it there.
It’s not like a penis shape or anything it literally looks like it could be a body massager.

Ugh.
I need to move out.
I’ve applied to over 20 jobs and nothing.
I’m also in a Covid unaffected area as well.
My parents are divorced and they don’t like each other either so yeah.
And I live with my Mum.
And my brother now lives full time with us.

He also kicked out dog the other day because it walked past him.

I’m sorry to post this here but I really need advice.
I need to move out but I’m scared and I have no friends or family either I could stay with.
And I have no money.

It makes me feel so unworthy that no one believes me. And I know for a fact if I was skinny people would.
Even if they don’t realise it, what they’re thinking is, oh well she’s not even attractive so why would anyone even if it was her own brother want to touch her like that.
Do you know what it’s like to know no one believes you.
It’s really really crushing.

My mental health is really suffering because of this.

I don’t know what to do.

I also am so frustrated with myself because my memory is so fucked up.
Like I really block out everything.
I have to write every incident down in my notes otherwise I get gaslit into believing I made it up by my family.
And then I believe I made it up because I don’t believe every detail.

I don’t think my Mum really wants to do the hard parts of mothering anymore.
Whenever he kids fight or my brother beats up on me she locks herself in her room or just turns on Suits on Netflix.

A Queen head of my ship with my King next to my hip.

My ex has hit me over and over thru out 2 years I wasn't allowed to leave because he would threaten to kill me and my unborn child at the time which is not his child I was pregnant wen I got with him thru out the first year he became verbally abusive and then in June 2019 I had my daughter he started becoming physically abusive to me and sum times my baby too and when the abuse started we was living in an areas called fruitland wa where we did not have any service or Wi-Fi and we were away from neighbors so even when I was screaming for help no one could hear us I wasn't even able to call the police or get any kind of help from anyone 2 weeks after I had my daughter I tried leaving and he kept threatening to kill me and kill her and I couldn't leave due to not having a vehicle at the time because we were sharing and he would not give me the keys since I paid for the car at the time he kept threatening me over and over but like I was saying two weeks after I had my daughter he held me down raped me I ended up pregnant and 6 weeks later he kicked me in the stomach causing me to miscarriage then throughout the next couple months up until December of 2019 he done it again held me down time my feet together raped me wow holding a loaded gun to my head and I couldn't get any kind of help due to the police being an hour and a half away as being at least 20 minutes from the nearest neighbor and having no service or Wi-Fi he would not stop even when I was yelling stop no stop over and over and over again he continued it and then January came about two weeks in I finally got away I went to stay with his old foster mom was only planning for a couple days until I got a ticket to come out to my grandma's up in Morton Washington with my daughter and she had set up with him to lie to CPS to keep me from leaving to my grandparents with my daughter even though my daughter is not his so they really had no right then it was over and I told her to drop me and the baby off at the train station so we can leave instead she went on the highway she pushed me out the moving vehicle and spit off with my daughter and I have not seen her since January 22nd 2020 yes it's been a year from that day I've reported to the police about everything from rape to the abuse to child abuse to all the death threats and even gave them all the proof videos voice recordings pictures and even physical proof on my body right now which is in these photos above but yes he had his old foster mom kidnap my 7-month-old daughter at that time from me and still is refusing to give her back and he even might have fleeed the state of Washington to go to California without any permission from me he literally has no right to my daughter he is not her father he is not on the birth certificate and we are not married she is not related to him in any type of way for him to have her I have full custody and have paperwork stating it but I've been back and forth with the police since day one and they have not done nothing to help me get her back I've been in and out of court since day one of last year and it's moving into a process but it should have already been done and I already should have had my daughter back by now they cannot my daughter from me she is now a year and a half and I have not seen her since she was seven months old this s*** is just crazy and f***** up for real I don't know why they are allowing him to get away with the abuse the rape child abuse and kidnapping of my daughter I have not stopped trying to get her back I'm doing everything I can it's just hard when I don't know if you left the state or not to even locate him that's it but we have court coming up on the 17th of this month and I'm hoping it goes good and I can go get her away from him safely and hopefully he'll be locked up for everything

Is there any places that can help or any numbers that can be given to me for me to call and if I reported this right away before and they have not done nothing can I re-report it to the police so they can look into it once again and hopefully arrest him

post_text:
****TRIGGER ALERT*****
Sometimes as I am rewriting my book about my life, I remember something painful. So I remember the big things, my molestation, gang rape, date rape, emotional abuse, drug addiction, etc. I forgot about a the boy who attacked me and tried to rape me on my way home from school. Even though that was hard that isn't what was the painful memory.
The painful part was my mother's reaction when she came home and saw police in her house. My God-mother had called them when she came over to comfort me. The look my mother gave me for calling for help was painful. She was angry that I called anybody for help. She wanted me to suffer in silence and not ask for justice. She never pressed charges and punished me for "involving the police into a family matter".

post_text:
Today I was finally able to leave my abuser.
After getting beat nearly to death I found the strength to leave. It’s been 9 long agonizing years.

I’ve have guns shoved in my mouth, I’ve been hit upside the head with pots and pans, burned by cigarettes and I’ve even had dog shit thrown at me.

I can’t believe that I’m still standing, my kids are the ones who give me the strength to keep going tho.

My youngest son suffers from an autoimmune disease so it’s been HELL staying in the house with him during Covid. I’m usually able to escape during the day and take my kids out for an activity or to the park but I couldn’t risk my son getting sick and leaving my daughter in the house with my abuser.

For now, the kids and I are camping out in the car until I can find some resources to help us.

If anyone is in the MADISON WI area and can bring us blankets to keep warm throughout the night I would appreciate so much! It gets extremely cold here especially At night.

Words of encouragement and prayers are welcome too💗🤞🏾

post_text:
My name is Nicole Iwamoto. I live on Oahu.
How to get rid of this depression, I've so many emotions.
Please no "hi how are you" questions cus most likely I'd be lying.
I'm told reaching out, telling ones story, making friends helps.
I'm so full of doubt.
I'll never know if I don't try.
I cannot tell a lie.
This maybe my time to shine...
I recently turned 40.
I feel as though I havent accomplished a thing!

It's hard to remember anything, focus concentrate, constantly losing things...
ADHD...its a serious issue,
crap I just lost my tissue!

Being bi polar isn't going to well.
The halo hides my horns very well.
You'd break your ankle trying to walk in my shoes,
So you'd best move.

When my anxiety sets in I feel the world around closing me in.
I can't sit still,
remember to breathe out and in,
so I pace and panic
It makes me a little manic.
All I can do is walk...
it hurts to talk

PTSD triggers and flashbacks are never fun.
It seems I'm always on the run.
Certain cars, trucks, faces, phrases are triggers for me...
I just gotta remember to breathe.

Suicidal ideations no joke.
Sometimes life's too hard for me.
I get DISTURBED so easily.
With all I've been through I've so much empathy...
HEAR ME OUT NOW, to those who are BROKEN, IN PIECES, TRAPT, GIVEN UP, GOING UNDER, CRAWLING IN THE DARK, ABOUT TO BREAK, want to DISAPPEAR, HEARTS FULL OF PAIN...
U... R...NOT...ALONE!
So SPIN yourself RIGHTROUND and SHOUT! LET IT ALL OUT! and say NO MORE! TO THE DEMONS INSIDE! OPEN YOUR EYES.
It may be EASIER TO RUN but you have to push FOREWORD, with our HANDS HELD HIGH, I'll be your REASON TO FIGHT. SOMETIMES DARKNESS CAN SHOW YOU THE LIGHT,
So IN THE SHADOW OF THE DAY, LEAVE OUT ALL THE REST, it can't ALL have been FOR NOTHING, I'm WITH YOU. ARE YOU READY?
WAKE, NOTHING ELSE MATTERS but you. only you can BRING yourself BACK TO LIFE, with ONE MORE LIGHT...

To those who don't/won't/can't see depression/addiction as a disease
to actually fault/call selfish people who have committed suicide...
FUCK YOU!
With no concept/ understanding of what they've gone through.
SAD BUT TRUE
You really do look like a fool.

No longer silenced by my domestic violence.
If I see a woman or a man being beaten down I have and will take you down to the ground.
I only wish someone woulda done that for me. Word of advice don't make the mistake of asking us why don't we leave.
Try asking the abuser what makes them so abusive.
Such ignorance!
When it comes to DV ignorance definitely isn't bliss but dangerous.

Once a bottom bitch,
you could say I was tricked,
painfully I opted out quick.
I'm a survivor in more ways than 1.
I was human trafficked.

I'm passionately pro choice.
Don't take away my right to choose
It may come back at you.
Abortion is never an easy choice,
sometimes the best choice (as it was for me)
Always, ALWAYS a women choice,

I say let people love who they like.
Not sure you're ready for this fight.
No need pray away the gay.
I'm sure they've tried to pray u away.

When it comes to religion
I consider myself a Christian.
My sins are between God and I so everyone else's opinions/judgements are null and void.
James 4:12 comes to mind.
Try to keep in mind working on ur car in ur garage doesn't make u a mechanic
any more than going to church on Sunday makes u a Christian. Got it?

I'll proudly admit I am 1 of those twilight moms. It's team Swiss for me.
I just bought midnight sun.
Honestly never thought she'd end up publishing it.
Feels like it's been over 1000 years since Breaking Dawn!
This is gonna be so much fun!

My biggest reason for reaching out is to help others,
share my story
and make friends meet new people without a doubt!
Covid aside, if I wasn't stuck on Oahu so far away from everyone else
(it gets a bit boring)
put myself out there, not as shy
finding a running/workout buddy, going out for coffee beach book poetry club moms/girls night out would be just fine.
If what I've to say offends u in anyway please just let me know.
I'll be sure to say it alot s-l-o-w-e-r and LOUDER!
Feel free to add me as a friend,
Thank you for making it to the end.
Even though I have many regrets...
;;;;;;;;;;;;My story isn't over yet;;;;;;;;;;

post_text:
TRIGGER WARNING- DOMESTIC VIOLENCE, GROPING

-
-
-
-
-
-
-
-

Update 31/12

I left home.
It’s NYE about 9pm
I’m in the middle of my city.
I couldn’t stand going into a new year in the same toxic situation I am now.
I feel selfish.
I didn’t have to leave today.
My brother is not at my Mums house for another week.
But it makes me sick being with her, who accuses me of lying.
On Christmas Day my brother got me a ginger beer but tried to balance it on my boobs like a shelf.
The behaviour hasn’t stopped.
The violence hasn’t stopped.
No I don’t get black eyes from it.
But it hurts. And it happens everyday.
He calls me a fat pig everyday. And all sorts of names. Mimicked a big stomach because I’m fat.
We use to fight when we were younger of course! But that was kids fighting. Even playing field.
Even in the last few years I’m sure there has been times when I have been violent.
But never to the extent he has.
And when I was I would be punished for it or at least told off.
I don’t want to take up the homelessness and domestic violence services in my city. I feel selfish. Other people need it.
I think I’m just going to walk around. I have no $ but I don’t want to accept any that isn’t mine that I haven’t earned fair and squarely.
It doesn’t hurt that much that my brother hits me, we have both been through so much over the last couple of years through our parents toxic separation.
I have hurt and scared him when I attempted suicide multiple times.
It hurts that my parents don’t believe me.
I am nearly 19 years old I need to get my life together and move on.
It wasn’t my marriage that fucked up this family.
My Dad is hoarding all the $.
I am honestly very privileged and my parents are quite well off. Upper middle class if you like. But now my Mum is living paycheck to paycheck relying off loans from her multi millionaire Mum at times.
And my Dads a property developer who hasn’t worked in 4 years but has over a million dollars in a bank account.
We are a privileged family.
Their marriage just had to fuck up.
I don’t know what I’m going to do.

-
-
-
-
-
-

I’m feeling very lost right now
My previous posts have more context
My brother is tormenting me.
I went to the police in September last year. Well technically I didn’t go my school guidance councillor did.
My brother (who is 2 years younger than me) had been groping me.
He also has been hitting and punching me. One time he whipped me with a belt.
Apparently that was justified according to my Mum because I kept on turning off his PlayStation because I was begging my Mum to get rid of it because he has an addiction and gets violent after he’s played on it.
Now he’s developing a gambling addiction which wouldn’t be as worrying if our Grandfather wasn’t a Gambling addict and his Mother an alcoholic.

My Mum and Dad didn’t believe me.

He doesn’t touch anymore but he’s a lot bigger than me now. He punches and hits me. And I can’t fight back.
It’s different to when we used to fight as children.
My parents do nothing.

I am thinking of getting away.
I don’t have any money.
But I want to get away from these people.
Even though my brother won’t be back at my Mums house (where I live) for another week.
I cannot stand being in the same house as my Mother who did not believe me.
She even made jokes about it.
One time when we were in the car my brother was saying something about my boobs and my Mum said “haha ew that’s your sister”
And kept laughing.

And he blatantly hits me in front of her.
I’m not even provoking him.
I might just walk past him.

My Mum told me
“Well you do overreact when he hits you”

I don’t.
I promise I don’t.
No these are not black eye punches.
But it hurts.
It hurts a lot.

He came into my room and swept all the books off my desk for fun one time because I ate the last pizza.

I don’t know what to do.
I could stay at my Mums, I have my own room and everything.

Or I could leave.
I don’t know where to go though.
I’ve left before.
I stayed in a homeless shelter.
I could do that again.

I don’t know.
I also need to apply to University very soon. Within the next couple of days.
Because I want to go in March.

There are heaps of share houses and homeless shelters around here.
Is it selfish of me to take up a place there?

Remember also I am fat. So people aren’t attracted to me.
So I think that’s what my parents are thinking.
Her brother couldn’t of done that because know one would be attracted to her.
I have also done terrible things in the past to my family, like stealing from them when I was really angry at their behaviour and needed money. I am working to pay that back.
So please keep that in mind.

Please look at my other posts for more context.

playing field. even in the last few years i’m sure there has been times when i have been violent. but never to the extent he has. and when i was i would be punished for it or at least told off. i don’t want to take up the homelessness and domestic violence services in my city. i feel selfish. other people need it. i think i’m just going to walk around. i have no $ but i don’t want to accept any that isn’t mine that i haven’t earned fair and squarely. it doesn’t hurt that much that my brother hits me, we have both been through so much over the last couple of years through our parents toxic separation. i have hurt and scared him when i attempted suicide multiple times. it hurts that my parents don’t believe me. i am nearly    years old i need to get my life together and move on. it wasn’t my marriage that fucked up this family. my dad is hoarding all the $. i am honestly very privileged and my parents are quite well off. upper middle class if you like. but now my mum is living paycheck to paycheck relying off loans from her multi millionaire mum at times. and my dads a property developer who hasn’t worked in   years but has over a million dollars in a bank account. we are a privileged family. their marriage just had to fuck up. i don’t know what i’m going to do.  - - - - - -  i’m feeling very lost right now my previous posts have more context my brother is tormenting me. i went to the police in september last year. well technically i didn’t go my school guidance councillor did. my brother (who is   years younger than me) had been groping me. he also has been hitting and punching me. one time he whipped me with a belt. apparently that was justified according to my mum because i kept on turning off his playstation because i was begging my mum to get rid of it because he has an addiction and gets violent after he’s played on it. now he’s developing a gambling addiction which wouldn’t be as worrying if our grandfather wasn’t a gambling addict and his mother an alcoholic.  my mum and dad didn’t believe me.  he doesn’t touch anymore but he’s a lot bigger than me now. he punches and hits me. and i can’t fight back. it’s different to when we used to fight as children. my parents do nothing.  i am thinking of getting away. i don’t have any money. but i want to get away from these people. even though my brother won’t be back at my mums house (where i live) for another week. i cannot stand being in the same house as my mother who did not believe me. she even made jokes about it. one time when we were in the car my brother was saying something about my boobs and my mum said “haha ew that’s your sister” and kept laughing.  and he blatantly hits me in front of her. i’m not even provoking him. i might just walk past him.  my mum told me “well you do overreact when he hits you”  i don’t. i promise i don’t. no these are not black eye punches. but it hurts. it hurts a lot.  he came into my room and swept all the books off my desk for fun one time because i ate the last pizza.  i don’t know what to do. i could stay at my mums, i have my own room and everything.  or i could leave. i don’t know where to go though. i’ve left before. i stayed in a homeless shelter. i could do that again.  i don’t know. i also need to apply to university very soon. within the next couple of days. because i want to go in march.  there are heaps of share houses and homeless shelters around here. is it selfish of me to take up a place there?  remember also i am fat. so people aren’t attracted to me. so i think that’s what my parents are thinking. her brother couldn’t of done that because know one would be attracted to her. i have also done terrible things in the past to my family, like stealing from them when i was really angry at their behaviour and needed money. i am working to pay that back. so please keep that in mind.  please look at my other posts for more context.

post_text:
This is probably gonna be a long one, and I'm sorry. I live with 2 alcoholics. My wife and her mother. My wife is diagnosed severe aggressive bi-polar and refuses to take medication or talk to an actual doctor or even go to a counselor with me. If they don't both gang up on me and end up locking me outside then its usually just one or the other. My wife's mother is constantly drunk. Dawn to dusk. Even wakes up in the middle of the night to crack another can. My wife is an every other nighter. So to say. Last night I was in a video call with my mother trying to get her help with how I screwed up a baking recipe my wife gave me while tossed. The mother-in-law live in came to me from nowhere staggering and yelling about how I'm a piece of shit, a sad excuse of a man, a horrible father, an abusive husband etc etc on and on right infront of my mother. Me and my wife live on a ranch. We have a thoroughbred gelding and he has a touchy attitude so before I saddle him I have to lunge him for a bit. Lunging is making him run his moody-tude out for 15 mins or so in a round pen, however I have a 30 foot lunge line instead of a pen so he can get a full stride. Anyhow.... my wife's mother sat on the deck recording me and telling my 2 boys (both 4 years old and identical twins) I was being mean to the horse then later was screaming in my face about abusing animals and trying to kill em etc.

Eventually my wife came out of her room and put her mother in a choke hold and drug her to her room then threw her on her bed. Fucking insane but whatever. She then screams in my face "if I have to come back out here again you both are getting it!"

A few nights back my wife was proper tossed and close fisted me in the face while I was on the video chat with my buddy. A bit later she came back out and grabbed my guitar, told me she bought it for me 2 years ago for Christmas and was taking it back to go smash it and I drew my line. I grabbed it and held it behind my neck all the while she's clinging to it and tearing at it to try to break it from my grasp which wasn't getting her very far so she decided to use all of her body weight to overbalance me and shoved me into the front door. Somehow I cut my toe? Who the fuck knows, and raked my back down the hinges, bruised my outside pelvic area and landed my recently broken elbow on the tile with my own weight then retreated to the fridge to grab another before going for a smoko. Great she's gone for a while I thought.

I went out the front door to get away as per my usual escape back to my bedroom where I could lock the doors and hide till they passed out. Welp.... she was keen and as soon as she knew I locked the door she was in the living room grabbing the guitar and took it out to destroy it all the while I had my mother on the phone in my pocket and a voice recorder on the other phone I use for playing music through the radio.

So back to last night... her mother got outta bed a few hours later and came to the living room where we were singing with the kiddos and started another argument. At this point I had 4 beers because I felt relaxed enough that my wife was sharing time with me and the boys with no tussle, I knew if I answered anything..... I'd be in it with bothe of em. So I unpaused the radio. I guess that was a bad move. I got in it with both of em anyhow. Her mother tried to take the kids from me and put them to bed while telling them I was gonna be mean to them and being 4 beers into it myself.... I had enough. I let the kids be, went to get their blankets out and ready for bed and was met with her mother for the first time ever putting her hands on me while my wife was pushing her own body into me to get me away from the kids.

I pushed both of them off of me and ran out the front door and called 911 then waited on the line with the operator till the deputy showed up. I did NOT involve my wife on the call, just her mother. Her mom told the deputy I was getting rough with my wife and involved my wife. This isn't the first time law enforcement has been involved. Twice before I have called 911 because my wife was tossed and took a vehicle for a drive aggressively.

My background has a loss to a dui or drunk driver and I never got to say goodbye to the girl. Last text I got from her was "I'll see you tomorrow! Goodnight!". So I'm a bit crass against dui. I also worked fatality towing and cleaned up plenty of evils caused by drunk drivers.

Anyhow, the sheriff ended up putting me out of my own home last night to sleep in my car with broken windows away from my own home. My wife did message me later on snapchat and I ended up letting me back in the house at about 5 or 6 this morning. There was a bit of verbal abuse on her part and all I could be was apologetic and I don't know what to do anymore. I love her and I don't wanna walk away from my kids. Every time I try to leave she tells me I'm abandoning my boys and she always knew I would be that piece of shit father, yet she screams at me to leave almost every night.

Am I missing something? Am I the narcissistic asshole she says I am? Fuck I don't wanna be.. I just want my wife back and my family. I mean back to how she was 5 years ago, sweet and kind and gentle. Now its anyone on her snapchat to get nudes, or how she always tells me how her 4 bar husbands will gladly take my place anytime. I've tried to tell her how I feel, but I get accused of manipulation or gas lighting (what ever that is... I haven't googled it yet) or being a narcissist. I would like to know what I'm doing to make her hate me so much.

Is there anything I can do to fix this? I don't want to leave her, I know who she used to be and it isn't who she is now.

post_text: He hacked my facebook/email/instagram. He changed my intagram settings to private bc ive been sharing my story to bring awareness and to seek help to get my children back. Im also being moved because he changed the settings to track my location. Ive secured my accounts but hes a hacker...he learned that while he wasin the army so he will continue to stalk me online. He went to jail oct 31, 2019...the kids were taken same time. I was left with no money, no car, nowhere to go. He got out feb 29, 2020. I went to court to try to get them to Canada before he got out. DSS fought me in court & I wasnt allowed to take them. He got out Feb 29, 2020. I knew he was responsible for hacking and stealing my identity but i didnt have enough proof to exonerate myself. His girlfriend continued his shady hacking while in jail and I knew if I didnt go back to him before he got out I would end up in jail for fraud so I had to go back. I continued to try to get my kids back and collect evidence that he was hacking me while his abuse continued. He had a locked trunk with combination locks and I found 30 phones/laptops/sd cards/flash drives/external hard drive/his passcode books. i screenshotted all of it and downloaded his files while he slept or was busy. I hid money inside a deodorant which I saved to leave once I had enough. Once I had the files...and I had just enough money I left August 2020. I continued and still continue to fight for my children

Not so lovely. He has now said he doesn’t want her Christmas Day and can I do it and he also wants me to still have her new year eve. His words. She will be better off with you. (Basically he can’t be arsed to think outside the box and make a day about his daughter and not just about him and he wants to be able to get smashed new year still).

I’ve refused to accept the gifts 🎁 as he never messages to ask how she is or offer any extra days over Christmas or any time tbh. So the gifts are at my friends bcus I truly belive.

post_text:
I know it's probably "instinct" but has anyone else first and foremost gotten rid of, one way or another (I'm tempted to burn everything but that would be wasteful) the things you were wearing at the time of the attack? It's like you want to get rid of everything that's "cursed" that you attracted THAT while wearing? I mean, even if you were putting up with the behaviour for a roof over your head and it was things "he" was buying you and insisting you wear....in this last case, the bloke even tried to tell me what UNDEWEAR to put on and when. I would burn all of it but I have a better idea and it's wash them and put everything in the giveaway bins for the Red Cross, and maybe try a de-cursing spell on them before hand.
I know that's the reason why all Safe Houses give you new or new-to-you-anyway, clothes and stuff. Leave it all behind and just GO, sort of thing. Like, take only your birth certificate and your passport (if you still have even THAT) and just GO. (In my case right now the Irish Embassy is trying to dig up the original of my passport application from the archives up in Dublin so they can even issue me an ETD so I can finish just getting the hell out of here. Since I can't "Swim the Channel.")
I mean, it's instinct to want to just get rid of the things you were wearing and/or the things "he" bought for you...it's not my advanced age that's telling me this.
You know, girls, my Russian husband had better manners than these savages I'm meeting lately; even HE never told me what UNDERWEAR to wear.
It's like on that scene on "Divergent 3" where they get to the decontamination shower station and they're told to just take everything off and stick it in the incinerator. 🙄

Hello I am a survivor turned advocate!! I was abused for 16yrs been free for about 3yrs. I started a business to give back and help US all deal with the financial abuse!! One of my organizations have a contest for the advocates with the most support! Whoever gets the most post about their business will get their local domestic violence shelter awarded funds!!

Will you post the business on your page and help me win funds for the women and children staying at the Samaritan House, Virginia Beach??

post_text:
Today marks 2 Official months since my ex punched me in the face and sent me to the hospital. I still dream about him every night, I miss him and am very lonely. He is still in Montana where I was at with court I believe, I think he had a hearing the other day.
I just wish things could go back to normal or I could at least feel normal again. I can barely go out in public without my anxiety killing me, I can’t spend a lot of time at family functions without going insane and everything driving me crazy, I want someone and to be loved so bad but am no where near ready and still tremble at a mans touch in disgust.
It would be nice to have some people...I’m just having a rough day. This crap isn’t easy in the slightest...I really did love him and I didn’t even get to say goodbye to him or the animals. Just a fucked up way to end shit.

post_text: In 2017 I ended a violent relationship, one where I was assualted almost daily and that left me depressed and suicidal. After a PTSD diagnosis I turned to drugs/alcohol to cure my pain, by this time I hated myself and had been convinced of my unworthiness by my abuser. After two years of drug addiction I realized I needed help and healing. I discovered a spiritual text called A Course in Miracles which has been called "Christian Buddhism." It saved my life. I am now clean and helping other people that also feel broken inside. In January I'm leading a free 5 day seminar for anyone who's interested in how spirituality can help heal their pain. You can visit my website below to register or DM me for any questions. I hope this is appropriate for the group as I think I can help.

post_text: A mother I know has a 2-year-old child with a very dangerous person. They no longer live under the same roof. The mother can't get anyone to confirm, testify or complete an affidavit to this fact for fear of this dangerous person. Basically, anyone else close to this dangerous person has a restraining order on him however it can't protect this child since it's his father. If the mother runs away with her child, she will be in contempt of court with a warrant for her arrest and could lose custody. I guess criminal court and family court are different so the criminal court records have no bearing in family court. This is in Ontario Canada. Does anyone have any advice or experience?

5 year old Oyindamola was raped by a neighbor in Ondo State. She had just returned from school and was home alone. She was called by Femi their neighbor to buy him dry gin. When she returned he told her to bring it inside his house. It was then that he raped her.

Oyindamola sustained severe tissue damage and bleeding and had to be rushed to Fujah Specialist Hospital in Akure by her parents when her mother came back home and saw her bleeding.

Femi has been arrested by the police and investigations are currently ongoing. Her parents don't have much and need the help of the public to save their daughter's life. The rapist picture is also attached.

Here is the donation link:

quickraiz.com/campaign/133059-help-save-oyindamola

post_text:
2-years ago TODAY, i became a free woman! I finally came to my senses, that the life I was living, was NOT okay! But just like everyone else, I was afraid. I didn’t wanna be a single mom to five kids. How would I ever get by? But sitting in that hospital bed on December 1st 2018, it made me realize, I am so so so sooooo lucky, to still have my life!

Well let me tell you all! I am 27-years-old, and this is the happiest and the most content I have ever been with my life!!! And this group has helped me heal so much, knowing there are many people out there with similar stories. Thank you all for being apart of my healing process 💜💜💜.

post_text:
TRIGGER WARNING

RANT



I am so sick of being treated this way.
Ever since I can remember I’ve been asked to do everything for my brother who is 2 years younger than me.
Even my cousin can tell me that she remembers that happening.
“Blake go and pick up Henry’s shoes and take them to his room”
“Blake pick up Henry’s wet laundry from the bathroom”
“Blake put Henry’s dish in the dishwasher”
From the age of 7 to now.
I’m nearly 19.
My Mum left my Dad, 3 years ago because of these very reasons. He treated her like a slave.
For the last year I’ve been living with my Mum.
He was so disgusting he couldn’t even be bothered to wipe his arse properly and would leave shit stains all over the bed.
Would kick off his clothes and live in filth.
And then when it finally got too much and there was too much clutter (because he hoards and can’t put anything away) he would run around the house yelling at everyone about how “messy this fucking house is”.
There were a LOT more problems in the marriage then this.
But what I’m saying is that my brother is following in my Fathers foot steps.

My Dad was never violent.
He is emotionally and mentally abusive and scarred me.

My brother is violent.
But no one cares.
See I am overweight, so apparently that cancels out anything he does to me.
Last year I reported his to the police through my guidance councillor because he had started coming up behind me and touching my breasts through my shirt.
One time he started talking about my boobs in front of my Mum and she laughed it off and said
“Ew that’s your sister, Henry”
He hits me.
He punches and kicks me.
He torments me and tells me how disgusting and fat I am.
And they use everything I have ever done to justify his behaviour.
I stole money from my Mum and Dad over a long period of time totally a couple grand.
I feel bad about doing that and I am working to pay them back.
This started after they got separated.
I would take their credit card numbers or cash from their wallets and buy things and food to help me emotionally cope.
It was still completely wrong. But i understand why I did it.
My Dad is a property developer so is pretty well off and my Mum doesn’t have that much money but borrowed close to a million dollars from her rich Mother to fund a renovation on our house.
I am working things out first with my Mother. I give her 1/3 of everything I make with my regular job as a babysitter, and that goes to paying her back.
Once I’ve paid her back I’ll start paying my Dad back.

When I reported Henry to the police.
No one believed me.
Not the police.
Not my parents.
Nobody.

Everyone thought I made it up for attention.
I would never.
I understand how much an accusation like this to somebody who didn’t do it can affect them.
It is disgusting to lie about that.
But I did not lie.

I remember one time last year I turned off his PlayStation and I kept on turning it off because I was so angry with my mother that she was not controlling his time allowance on it. He has a gaming addiction and gets angry and violent after he plays.
I wanted her to stop him.
He took out his belt and hit me with it.

Then this year one time after this happened, my Mum told me that I overreacted when he hit me.
I promise I am not overreacting.
I would never.

My brother pisses all over the toilet seat and leaves his dirty clothes all over the bathroom.
My Mum often acts like she’s doing ME a favour when she asks him to clean it up.
When I refuse too.

post_text:
Hey everyone, new to the group and I hope to be able to show up and shine some positivity on what we can and share my knowledge around the mindset.

I've experienced a few abusive relationships, at first I didn't realize really what was going on because I was made to feel like I was the problem all the time, eventually I started to wonder if I was even though I KNEW I wasn't. I felt stuck, and confused, cause it was my first relationship where I really actually liked the girl, so Id go with the flow I guess you could say. I stayed in that for about a year and a lot happened, but thankfully nothing broke me

when I got out of that, I obviously had issues in my mindset still thinking I was this BIG problem, and the pattern continued into my next relationship, it had its highs and lows but it was another relationship that I SHOULD have not been in.

then I took a 2 year break and this last relationship was my WORST one. I got abused either emotionally Or physically everyday, I got a plate broken over my head, a black eye, death threats to my mom, chased around the house, bit, shirts torn and ripped off, scratched, it sounds like a night mare when I think about it, cause it was, then she would try and kill herself and I understood it really wasn't personal and I was afraid to leave her for her own safety, she completely switched into a person I've never seen before when we moved in.

there's alot to my stories but what I want everyone in here to really get about my post is that

Its NEVER personal, these people have underlying problems they dont deal with and then they bring it into their next relationship and its so bad and toxic and Im so sorry you had to go through that and feel like you were the problem. You are loved and you're worthy of love and the journey of self love is worth it and figuring out who we are and most importantly not putting up with peoples shit when we get mistreated :) thank you for this group and im Proud of all of you.

post_text:
It felt like my abuser threw daggers into my body.

His "flying monkeys" stood in a circle surrounding me & my abuser -as instructed.

The "Flying Monkeys" watched the daggers pierce me. They mocked me. Many alienated me. Most spread lies the abuser taught them to believe.

A person I love visits with those circling me -doing nothing because "it's not my place/business"
They love me &
believe me being abused & refuse to associate with my abuser.
They offer to be here to help mend me after the stabbing ends & the circle is gone ...but what if it's too late? What if I'm dead? What if I no longer want to live and allow myself to bleed out?

* *What are your boundaries?* *

Are YOU still in that circle being "stabbed" by "daggers"?
Do you need to create a safety plan to get out?

Are YOU still being mocked, alienated while lies are being spread about you?

Do you need help creating boundaries?

Creating boundaries was
THE HARDEST-BEST thing I did!
I removed toxic and opened doors to allow LIGHT, HOPE & a strong loyal tribe to come in its place.

#NoMoreSilence #outofdarkness #pinpointsoflight #settingboundaries

post_text:
Hey y’all.

I was in 10 years relationship. Left my ex so many times and ended up going back with him because of my comfort zone and it’s like my safety net even though I was physically, mentally and sexually abused. Left him for good in March 2020.

Then I was so depressed for a few months, started to see a counselor. Got on meds. Diagnosed with panic disorder, PTSD, depression and bipolar.

Then met a new guy in May after a hook up. We really liked each other. Sometimes whatever he’s doing would remind me of my ex and triggered me and then got a panic attack. Eventually I decided to open up to him about what happened. I asked him out on July.

My panic attacks have been getting worse. I started getting nightmares 2 weeks ago, I sweat so much that I have to change the sheets. I woke up with rapid breathing, my heart was beating so fast, and paralyzed in fear. I just woke up from a nightmare and here I’m typing this post.

How the hell do I ever recover from this!? I had a talk to my bf and told him I don’t think it’ll work out and he was crying and he said he has been supportive and I just said it’s not right that he has to deal with me like this. Then he said he has a lot of patience, and he said I can do anything (traveling etc) to help with my recovery. He’s such a sweet guy 😞 I want to get better. I want to be happy again and do fun things with my current bf without getting panic attacks or breakdowns. I’d do anything to get my mind erased 😞

post_text:
Hi everyone. I'm new I'm randi I was in a 3 year relationship with an abusive narcissist. I felt so trapped and so worthless. One day thankfully (on valentine's day no less) a guy gave me his phone number and it finally gave me the courage to break up with my ex through text.

I am now in a great relationship that I have been in for almost 5 years. It gets better I promise.

A few months ago I started Doll Face Vault which is a self defense items business to empower woman and not make them feel like a victim. But to make them feel like a badass. I sell pepperspray, stun guns and self defense keychains as well.

post_text: I'm not backing down! State's Attorney is charging my soon to ne Ex with a class 2 felony Aggravated Battery with intent to do bodily harm. Now I find out because of his age, covid-19 and his last felony Dui was 12yrs ago most he can get is 3yrs but they said The Judge can give him just probation! Now I understand why women don't report it! They get off easy! But I'm not giving up! I'm going to fight to get him locked up to the max! He goes and plays golf! He still goes to the bars! post_text:
I really need help for my kiddos so I'm hoping I can post here to get help 😔😭. Admins if I cant I'm sorry you can delete my post, I'm just desperate for help. I do not have family to help. I am in need of donations of anything on my amazon wish list, I just escaped a very severe 15 year domestic violence situation, both me and my sons were severely abused and I left with only my kids and what clothes I could get. It was way to dangerous to gather things. I got a 3 year restraining order and full custody and our local Alliance against family Violence here in town helped us get our own place and thankfully a local church donated beds, a fridge, couch and TVs but we are in need of many things as my pay does not meet the our bill's. Any help would be so appreciated.

My sons birthday is next saturday and we have nothing for him so my sister made an amazon wishlist of his gifts he wanted and I added on the flashcards and learning toys they both need to help them learn. I thought one of my sons was autistic until I left and he started talking and told me what his dad had done to him and it makes me sick to my stomach. Theres a good place in hell for him. I had one lady in a group tell me I'm just asking for things for free until I sent her the court documentation and 7 page declaration going into graphic detail of abuse and she had nothing to say after that. I wish I was making up what happened. 😔 I need to figure out how to do a facebook fundraiser so I can hopefully get donations to help pay for groceries, we get food stamps but not enough for all of us.

Thank you to anyone here that can help us. Hopefully I can make some friends in this group so I can have a support system as I have no friends.

https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/3L8QKC1ZONA1T?ref_=wl_share

I'm doing distant learning as I cannot afford daycare and I left all their flashcards and books and learning materials when I left, I wish I would have had time to gather them and their clothes. I'm glad I left but financially it's scary.
