post_text:
I have been battling in court for 6 years for my children. I have made agreements with the NEX and regretted every single one of them. I have been on the losing end of this battle many times. My friends and family are flabbergasted that my NEX is even allowed to have the children.

With all that being said I am not a lawyer and this is not legal advice. This is just what has simply been working for me.

Every Family Court has “Rules of Court”. What I have done this round of court proceedings, is study the rules of the court. My advice is to become very familiar with them. Having this knowledge has helped me tremendously.

Another little tip is Judges and lawyers are held to a code of ethics. After reading the rules of the court, if there was a decision made that doesn’t exactly line up, file for a judicial review. The judges decisions will be looked at and possibly reveresed if the “Rules of the Court” were not followed.

Another little tip that can help is writing a letter to the Presiding Judge of the court, regarding the other judges rulings. Now this has to come from a legal stand point. So again read the “Rules of the Court”.

If your NEX’s, shit bag lawyer goes into court and bold face lies about what is happening, read your states code of ethics for attorneys and file with the BAR. If they are violating the rules they can and will be punished.

I currently have 2 Judges in my case under Judicial Review and my NEX’s attorney is being investigated by the BAR.

Wouldn’t you know, I’m finally being taken seriously and people with authority are now listening. Again I’m not an attorney and only stating what has been working for me after 6 years.

Good luck Ladies and Gents!

post_text:
By Zik Gbemre

THERE IS MORE TO THE CORONAVIRUS (COVID-19) THAN WHAT THE GOVERNMENT OF CHINA AND THE NIGERIAN GOVERNMENT ARE TELLING NIGERIANS

We have always reiterated the fact that the Chinese can never be trusted by anyone on this planet earth. And every day, more facts are coming up to justify this observation, especially since the outbreak of the Coronavirus (Covid-19) Pandemic. There is something the Chinese are hiding about the Covid-19 so-called disease, and sadly, it appears the Nigerian Government, like some others around the world, have bought into their "packs of lies" and is now helping to play out their script. For instance, how can we be dealing with a so-called virus which they say it has no cure yet, but there has not been an autopsy on the dead bodies of those who have died from the pandemic? No autopsy has been conducted by medical experts and pathologists to know exactly what caused the deaths of those allegedly killed by the Covid-19 disease, so as to know how to come up with a cure to the said virus. Agreed that the Covid-19 is real and many people are dying from it, but there is evidently something they are hiding about the Coronavirus (Covid-19), which they do not want the rest of the world to know. In my view, the Covid-19 looks like "a chemical weapon fraud", which was created by the Chinese to cause global deaths (including their own people), for global economic gains.

I am not the only one who think this way. In a recent TV program aired on ITV Benin, two Professors, Prof Cyril Otoikhian and Prof Josiah Adjene, as discussion panel, gave a vivid explanation and evidence to justify this line of argument concerning the Covid-19 pandemic. When asked if there is anything to be afraid about the Coronavirus, Professor Cyril Otoikhian (Genetics and Animal breeding), stated and noted that: ‘From my research about Covid-19, there is nothing to be scared about it. But because of the way it has been presented, it is obvious that people will be scared. The scare factor has been added to the Covid-19, which has made it a pandemic. Why is it called Coronavirus or Covid-19? I thought it would be called coronary virus. If you look at Covid-19 as a concept, I have told people that there is nothing to be scared about.

“When you say something is a virus, and from all ramifications, and all scientific implications they have mentioned about it, it does not obey basic scientific proofs. Then you don’t need to bother yourself about it. We are told that it is an organism. How can a virus be an organism? We are saying Covid-19 is affecting people, but how is it affecting people? What medical laboratory procedure, or what scientific protocol did you engage, isolate and now classified as Covid-19? If I am sick for instance, and I go to a Doctor, the Doctor will ask me certain questions. And he will weigh the information provided, then from there he will say, I suspect you have malaria. Then he asks you to go to the medical Laboratory. That medical Laboratory he has sent you to, is to confirm his suspicions. What you do when you get to the medical laboratory. They take sample, basically may be blood sample. I am not a medical Laboratory scientist. But I know that there are procedures that they follow to isolate the microbes or whatever, resulting in malaria symptoms. Let us take it back to Covid-19. What have they found out about it in the medical lab? All we hear is that two persons are positive today. 20 persons the next day. The other day it is now 300. Then all of a sudden, after a day or two, we hear they are positive, and from positive to negative, and then they are released.

"What did you now do under the isolations centres they are using to scare everybody? And keeping everybody at home. What did you do in that isolation centre? What scientific procedures did you apply to prove to the world and explain what we are experiencing? Or this is what is killing people. Covid-19 has more than what we are made to see. There is more to this than what we are being told. And scientifically, we are willing to be challenged by any person, that the Covid-19 has failed all scientific principle of classifying disease. Either being a virus or whatever. We were told that it originated from Wuhan China, so we know the source. But how did it originate? Is it just a new virus that just emanated? If it kills people daily in their hundreds, those people killed, what happens to them? For instance, the Federal Government of Nigeria says anyone killed by Coronavirus will not be released… but there is a work of the pathologists to ask, what is the resultant effect of the deaths? Which areas of the body does it affect and thus leading to death? We are told it affects the respiratory tract/system. Thank God I am an anatomist. Let us start from the respiratory tract. Even from the information they said it leads to copious secretion of mucus. And the respiratory tract -starting from the Trachea, or the wind-pipe, as common man would say it. And the Oesophagus called gullet, they begin at the same cervical vertebrae. The only difference is that the trachea is at the top while the Oesophagus is below… information available says that it is secreted mucus, which eventually leads to the blockage of the respiratory tract. And no human being can survive without oxygen. It shows that the oxygen going into the respiratory tract, and into the lungs, is being stopped, then the issue is, if it is just secretion of mucus that blocks the respiratory system. Are there no drugs to clear the airwaves? And yet they keep saying there is no cure/solution.

"Currently in Nigeria, 33 (even though this figure has changed from the time of this report), persons have been discharged; what medicines did they use? And I want to stand to say that temperature above 30 can destroy it. And we know that our local Agbo, when boiled and inhaled, can equally clear the airwaves. And we say that there is no solution to the disease.

"From the initial information given about the Covid-19, the entire human race was made to believe that this package is deadly. A lot of components have been added to it. The initial information was void of scientific proofs. Remember that, there were even issues with the publications that what we are experiencing involves DNA and RNA. And because of that, it is a living thing. When it enters the body, it is able to do this and that. My surprise is that such statements are coming from even the World Health Organization (WHO). That is what baffles me most. Let us look at it. Virus are not organisms. Virus are ‘CHEMICAL COMPONENTS.’ The DNA and RNA that they see in the Virus is components of chemicals that are joined/linked together to form a POISONOUS SUBSTANCE. So, what it does is, it goes inside the system…and since the virus is not an organism, it does not have a cell. It does not have any genetic make-up because it is not a living thing. It does not have genetic make-up. The DNA and RNA they are talking about are chemical substances. And the one you find in a living thing is different from the one you find in a non-living thing. A virus cannot undergo the characteristics of a living thing.

"So, somebody has gone somewhere to produce something it can hibernate anywhere because it is a chemical substance. And when it goes inside the body, then it carries out its deadly chemical operations. We are talking of poison. We are talking of a chemical substance. There was another new one that came out recently called the Hantavirus, which killed one Chinese. And one would wonder why are all the virus killing the Chinese first? SO, WE ARE IN THE MIDST OF CHEMICAL WEAPONS. WE ARE IN THE MIDST OF CHEMICAL WARFARE. People have made several statements. Somebody has said the world is paying for what China did. Nobody has asked him what he knows about what China did? The world has not asked China what they did either. What did you people do? What was that preparation they made that gave rise to the Coronavirus?

“There is professor at Harvard University who was part of the research in China that gave rise to this disease, and he has been arrested severally.”

On this particular development, recent report revealed that, in what it called “Chinese economic espionage and research theft”, the 60 years old Professor, Dr. Charles Lieber, who was the Chair of Harvard Chemistry Department and charged with concerning ties to China, had signed a Contract with Chinese University in Wuhan China, and was paid up to $50,000 per month, plus up to $158,000 in living expenses. He also allegedly received more than $1.5 million to set up a research laboratory in China, while still working at Harvard and receiving grants from US Department of Defence, and National Institute of health. Also charged were two Chinese nationals. One worked as a scientist in Boston University, and the other, a lady who was in the Liberation Army, who worked in Cancer research in Israelis Medical Center. These people are now being charged for trying to smuggle biological materials out of the US to China, and lying about it to US Federal Investigators. Now we can see the genesis of the problems we are currently facing today, and why the Chinese can’t be trusted.

Prof Cyril noted that, “we are so lucky. When I say we, I mean the whole world, because what they prepared is also affecting them the more. If that chemical weapon was airborne, by now we all would be affected. Initially they said it is not airborne, but now they say it has mutated. But how can a non-living thing mutate? They should not take the world for granted and think that there are no scientists to challenge them… As reporters, when you go to the field what do you see? Those who have been discharged in Nigeria, who are they? What are their names? Shouldn’t autopsy be carried out on those who died? And the reports made known to reporters. When you post a challenge to them via social media, there are responses from the Government and its agencies, including even the WHO. So, we have asked them, let us see one of the dead bodies to carry out an autopsy. And they tell us, in a country that has constitution which governs it, that when somebody dies, because it is Coronavirus, the body will not be released to the family. They are hiding something.

“Number one, the world is paying for what China has produced. Secondly, China is hiding information about Coronavirus/Covid-19. When we put these things together, it gives us a headway to suggest that there is a very crafty work done somewhere to destroy the human race. Why do we need Chinese Doctors to come to Nigeria when they have not been able to take care of their own? Some of us have come out to show that COVID-19 IS FRAUD TO THE WORLD.
“We are not saying that people are not dying. What we are saying is that, IT IS NOW LEFT FOR THE WORLD TO FIND OUT WHAT IS THAT CHEMICAL WEAPON THAT HAS BEEN PROPOSED, WHICH HAS LEAKED TO THE WORLD AND IS NOW AFFECTING DIFFERENT COUNTRIES?... If they allow an autopsy to be carried out on a dead person who died from the Coronavirus, through pathological analysis, it will give a clue to know the basis of which that chemical substance was encoded. Then we will have a clue on how to produce an antidote.”

Some of the suggestions given by Prof Cyril on the way forward, he said “people should avoid going to the trouble zones. I mean the places where this chemical substance emanated from and targeted. And also, I wonder why they said wash only the hands? What about the clothes and shoes you are wearing? This is because, as a chemical substance, it can be on any surfaces, and carried to anywhere by anyone. Check, all the cases in Africa started from people who had gone to the trouble zones, and then coming back, they came into their countries with the virus.”The two Nigerian Professors also left their phone contacts for anyone with questions, and to challenge them on their findings and observations about the Covid-19. Prof Cyril Otoikhian's GSM number is: 08033447416, and Prof Josiah Adjene’s number is: 08034084016.

Truth is, the present federal administration of Nigeria led by President Buhari should listen to the voice of reason and take the popular opinion of Nigerians. From all available information, China doesn't mean well for any country. They are just after how to make money and displace US as an economic power. The Chinese doctors/pharmacists imported by his administration shouldn't have been here in the first place. Nigeria has the best brains in the medical profession worldwide. Nigeria has the best medical doctors, and our pharmacists are the best amongst other developed nations. What Nigeria lacks is the needed health infrastructure.The government has not invested in the health sector as they ought to. Nigeria has not invested in pharmaceutical companies and scientific research centres. The nation has the manpower. So, bringing in the Chinese is a dangerous move. The Nigerian Medical Association of all medical professionals have gone against bringing in the Chinese but yet President buhari went ahead with it. Yet, our public hospitals are like waste bins all over Nigeria. Why should the President Buhari administration go against the opinions of Nigerian medical professionals? These are experts in the medical sector, giving professional advice to the federal government, so why going against the advice of experts? Why don't we have regards for our own here, who are well recognized in the developed countries? Nigerians has best brains in the medical sector and they play vital roles. Why should a govt that cares for people should not take opinions of experts? Today, Nigerians are being treated like animals in China, with many evicted from their homes and hotels in China. Yet, the Federal Government of Nigeria under President Buhari is giving the same people a red carpet reception and first class treatment. What a shame! As far as I am concerned, the federal government should ask those Chinese to leave with their vaccines, drugs and testing kits.

Already, there is a rumour going round that, in order for the President Buhari-led Federal Government to pave way to secure the "$22.7Billion Loan" from the Chinese Government, which was approved in March 2020, by "Senator Ahmed Lawan (Nigerian Senate President)," they have accepted the offer from Chinese Government to allegedly administer the "Chinese Anti-Corona Virus Vaccine" on Nigerians. The said "Chinese Vaccine, Test-Kits & Face Mask" has allegedly been confirmed by international community (The Netherlands, Germany, France, Britain... etc), to be "CONTAMINATED" with the "Corona Virus" already.
Whatever the case may be, we ask that every Nigerian citizenry should be very vigilant and mindful of everything that is going on around them across the country because as it is now, with everything that is happening, this government has proven to be a government that cannot be trusted by the Nigerian public.
Zik Gbemre,
April 12, 2020

We Mobilize Others To Fight For Individual Causes As If Those Were Our Causes

text_blob: by zik gbemre  there is more to the coronavirus (covid-  ) than what the government of china and the nigerian government are telling nigerians  we have always reiterated the fact that the chinese can never be trusted by anyone on this planet earth. and every day, more facts are coming up to justify this observation, especially since the outbreak of the coronavirus (covid-  ) pandemic. there is something the chinese are hiding about the covid-   so-called disease, and sadly, it appears the nigerian government, like some others around the world, have bought into their "packs of lies" and is now helping to play out their script. for instance, how can we be dealing with a so-called virus which they say it has no cure yet, but there has not been an autopsy on the dead bodies of those who have died from the pandemic? no autopsy has been conducted by medical experts and pathologists to know exactly what caused the deaths of those allegedly killed by the covid-   disease, so as to know how to come up with a cure to the said virus. agreed that the covid-   is real and many people are dying from it, but there is evidently something they are hiding about the coronavirus (covid-  ), which they do not want the rest of the world to know. in my view, the covid-   looks like "a chemical weapon fraud", which was created by the chinese to cause global deaths (including their own people), for global economic gains.  i am not the only one who think this way. in a recent tv program aired on itv benin, two professors, prof cyril otoikhian and prof josiah adjene, as discussion panel, gave a vivid explanation and evidence to justify this line of argument concerning the covid-   pandemic. when asked if there is anything to be afraid about the coronavirus, professor cyril otoikhian (genetics and animal breeding), stated and noted that: ‘from my research about covid-  , there is nothing to be scared about it. but because of the way it has been presented, it is obvious that people will be scared. the scare factor has been added to the covid-  , which has made it a pandemic. why is it called coronavirus or covid-  ? i thought it would be called coronary virus. if you look at covid-   as a concept, i have told people that there is nothing to be scared about.  “when you say something is a virus, and from all ramifications, and all scientific implications they have mentioned about it, it does not obey basic scientific proofs. then you don’t need to bother yourself about it. we are told that it is an organism. how can a virus be an organism? we are saying covid-   is affecting people, but how is it affecting people? what medical laboratory procedure, or what scientific protocol did you engage, isolate and now classified as covid-  ? if i am sick for instance, and i go to a doctor, the doctor will ask me certain questions. and he will weigh the information provided, then from there he will say, i suspect you have malaria. then he asks you to go to the medical laboratory. that medical laboratory he has sent you to, is to confirm his suspicions. what you do when you get to the medical laboratory. they take sample, basically may be blood sample. i am not a medical laboratory scientist. but i know that there are procedures that they follow to isolate the microbes or whatever, resulting in malaria symptoms. let us take it back to covid-  . what have they found out about it in the medical lab? all we hear is that two persons are positive today.    persons the next day. the other day it is now    . then all of a sudden, after a day or two, we hear they are positive, and from positive to negative, and then they are released.  "what did you now do under the isolations centres they are using to scare everybody? and keeping everybody at home. what did you do in that isolation centre? what scientific procedures did you apply to prove to the world and explain what we are experiencing? or this is what is killing people. covid-   has more than what we are made to see. there is more to this than what we are being told. and scientifically, we are willing to be challenged by any person, that the covid-   has failed all scientific principle of classifying disease. either being a virus or whatever. we were told that it originated from wuhan china, so we know the source. but how did it originate? is it just a new virus that just emanated? if it kills people daily in their hundreds, those people killed, what happens to them? for instance, the federal government of nigeria says anyone killed by coronavirus will not be released… but there is a work of the pathologists to ask, what is the resultant effect of the deaths? which areas of the body does it affect and thus leading to death? we are told it affects the respiratory tract/system. thank god i am an anatomist. let us start from the respiratory tract. even from the information they said it leads to copious secretion of mucus. and the respiratory tract -starting from the trachea, or the wind-pipe, as common man would say it. and the oesophagus called gullet, they begin at the same cervical vertebrae. the only difference is that the trachea is at the top while the oesophagus is below… information available says that it is secreted mucus, which eventually leads to the blockage of the respiratory tract. and no human being can survive without oxygen. it shows that the oxygen going into the respiratory tract, and into the lungs, is being stopped, then the issue is, if it is just secretion of mucus that blocks the respiratory system. are there no drugs to clear the airwaves? and yet they keep saying there is no cure/solution.  "currently in nigeria,    (even though this figure has changed from the time of this report), persons have been discharged; what medicines did they use? and i want to stand to say that temperature above    can destroy it. and we know that our local agbo, when boiled and inhaled, can equally clear the airwaves. and we say that there is no solution to the disease.  "from the initial information given about the covid-  , the entire human race was made to believe that this package is deadly. a lot of components have been added to it. the initial information was void of scientific proofs. remember that, there were even issues with the publications that what we are experiencing involves dna and rna. and because of that, it is a living thing. when it enters the body, it is able to do this and that. my surprise is that such statements are coming from even the world health organization (who). that is what baffles me most. let us look at it. virus are not organisms. virus are ‘chemical components.’ the dna and rna that they see in the virus is components of chemicals that are joined/linked together to form a poisonous substance. so, what it does is, it goes inside the system…and since the virus is not an organism, it does not have a cell. it does not have any genetic make-up because it is not a living thing. it does not have genetic make-up. the dna and rna they are talking about are chemical substances. and the one you find in a living thing is different from the one you find in a non-living thing. a virus cannot undergo the characteristics of a living thing.  "so, somebody has gone somewhere to produce something it can hibernate anywhere because it is a chemical substance. and when it goes inside the body, then it carries out its deadly chemical operations. we are talking of poison. we are talking of a chemical substance. there was another new one that came out recently called the hantavirus, which killed one chinese. and one would wonder why are all the virus killing the chinese first? so, we are in the midst of chemical weapons. we are in the midst of chemical warfare. people have made several statements. somebody has said the world is paying for what china did. nobody has asked him what he knows about what china did? the world has not asked china what they did either. what did you people do? what was that preparation they made that gave rise to the coronavirus?  “there is professor at harvard university who was part of the research in china that gave rise to this disease, and he has been arrested severally.”  on this particular development, recent report revealed that, in what it called “chinese economic espionage and research theft”, the    years old professor, dr. charles lieber, who was the chair of harvard chemistry department and charged with concerning ties to china, had signed a contract with chinese university in wuhan china, and was paid up to $  ,    per month, plus up to $   ,    in living expenses. he also allegedly received more than $ .  million to set up a research laboratory in china, while still working at harvard and receiving grants from us department of defence, and national institute of health. also charged were two chinese nationals. one worked as a scientist in boston university, and the other, a lady who was in the liberation army, who worked in cancer research in israelis medical center. these people are now being charged for trying to smuggle biological materials out of the us to china, and lying about it to us federal investigators. now we can see the genesis of the problems we are currently facing today, and why the chinese can’t be trusted.  prof cyril noted that, “we are so lucky. when i say we, i mean the whole world, because what they prepared is also affecting them the more. if that chemical weapon was airborne, by now we all would be affected. initially they said it is not airborne, but now they say it has mutated. but how can a non-living thing mutate? they should not take the world for granted and think that there are no scientists to challenge them… as reporters, when you go to the field what do you see? those who have been discharged in nigeria, who are they? what are their names? shouldn’t autopsy be carried out on those who died? and the reports made known to reporters. when you post a challenge to them via social media, there are responses from the government and its agencies, including even the who. so, we have asked them, let us see one of the dead bodies to carry out an autopsy. and they tell us, in a country that has constitution which governs it, that when somebody dies, because it is coronavirus, the body will not be released to the family. they are hiding something.  “number one, the world is paying for what china has produced. secondly, china is hiding information about coronavirus/covid-  . when we put these things together, it gives us a headway to suggest that there is a very crafty work done somewhere to destroy the human race. why do we need chinese doctors to come to nigeria when they have not been able to take care of their own? some of us have come out to show that covid-   is fraud to the world. “we are not saying that people are not dying. what we are saying is that, it is now left for the world to find out what is that chemical weapon that has been proposed, which has leaked to the world and is now affecting different countries?... if they allow an autopsy to be carried out on a dead person who died from the coronavirus, through pathological analysis, it will give a clue to know the basis of which that chemical substance was encoded. then we will have a clue on how to produce an antidote.”  some of the suggestions given by prof cyril on the way forward, he said “people should avoid going to the trouble zones. i mean the places where this chemical substance emanated from and targeted. and also, i wonder why they said wash only the hands? what about the clothes and shoes you are wearing? this is because, as a chemical substance, it can be on any surfaces, and carried to anywhere by anyone. check, all the cases in africa started from people who had gone to the trouble zones, and then coming back, they came into their countries with the virus.”the two nigerian professors also left their phone contacts for anyone with questions, and to challenge them on their findings and observations about the covid-  . prof cyril otoikhian's gsm number is:            , and prof josiah adjene’s number is:            .  truth is, the present federal administration of nigeria led by president buhari should listen to the voice of reason and take the popular opinion of nigerians. from all available information, china doesn't mean well for any country. they are just after how to make money and displace us as an economic power. the chinese doctors/pharmacists imported by his administration shouldn't have been here in the first place. nigeria has the best brains in the medical profession worldwide. nigeria has the best medical doctors, and our pharmacists are the best amongst other developed nations. what nigeria lacks is the needed health infrastructure.the government has not invested in the health sector as they ought to. nigeria has not invested in pharmaceutical companies and scientific research centres. the nation has the manpower. so, bringing in the chinese is a dangerous move. the nigerian medical association of all medical professionals have gone against bringing in the chinese but yet president buhari went ahead with it. yet, our public hospitals are like waste bins all over nigeria. why should the president buhari administration go against the opinions of nigerian medical professionals? these are experts in the medical sector, giving professional advice to the federal government, so why going against the advice of experts? why don't we have regards for our own here, who are well recognized in the developed countries? nigerians has best brains in the medical sector and they play vital roles. why should a govt that cares for people should not take opinions of experts? today, nigerians are being treated like animals in china, with many evicted from their homes and hotels in china. yet, the federal government of nigeria under president buhari is giving the same people a red carpet reception and first class treatment. what a shame! as far as i am concerned, the federal government should ask those chinese to leave with their vaccines, drugs and testing kits.  already, there is a rumour going round that, in order for the president buhari-led federal government to pave way to secure the "$  . billion loan" from the chinese government, which was approved in march     , by "senator ahmed lawan (nigerian senate president)," they have accepted the offer from chinese government to allegedly administer the "chinese anti-corona virus vaccine" on nigerians. the said "chinese vaccine, test-kits & face mask" has allegedly been confirmed by international community (the netherlands, germany, france, britain... etc), to be "contaminated" with the "corona virus" already. whatever the case may be, we ask that every nigerian citizenry should be very vigilant and mindful of everything that is going on around them across the country because as it is now, with everything that is happening, this government has proven to be a government that cannot be trusted by the nigerian public. zik gbemre, april   ,       we mobilize others to fight for individual causes as if those were our causes

post_text:
E-mail written to Ursula Von der Leyen
Dear Sir/Madam,
I write to you as a victim of cybertorture who has his whole family destroyed in a ritual of self-emasculation with both my father and my mother becoming victims of cybertorture, my father being remotely sodomised and my mother being forcefully committed to a psychiatric institution at the hand of former students from Colégio Militar (Pedro Grilo, Tito Eurico Miranda Fernandes, Luis Nazareth Carvalho Figueira, Rui Ricardo Borges Marques Sabino Reino and many more) and many individuals recruited by them (friends of Jasper Kums, Gonçalo Carvalho, João Leiria, Ivo Francisco, Gonçalo Bandeira Duarte, Carla Maria Marinho Rodrigues, Jana Schwerdfeger, etc) for talking to a girl about a taboo topic (physical punishment) and not describing accurately the way in which younger students were brutally punished and beaten to the point one went nearly deaf from one ear and others were not even allowed to go home due to how severely they were bruised.
The methodology consists of a large number of former students from Colégio Militar who watch whilst others sensitise me by combining and crafting various noxious stimuli (mostly focused on the genital area and skull) to force me to wake several times during the night to laugh as I am forced to commit involuntary acts of self-harm and they try to force involuntary suicide by attempting to force me to stab myself in the skull involuntarily, self-castrate myself involuntarily or break everything around me, followed by spending all day trying to force me tu cut off my ears or self-castrate myself.
I've been a victim of cybertorture since 1992-1993 when I was 14 years old at the hands of former students from Colégio Militar, Largo da Luz, Portugal for not stepping forward when asked who had a piece of uniform without his respective number on it.
Soon after whilst doing sports on the athletics track an illegal sentence of thoracic depression was forced upon me by Luis Nazareth Carvalho Figueira along with some verbal content of a vocal nature. I also had my catholic confirmation rite sabotaged with inappropriate and childish content for the occasion being forced upon me regarding God being bi-sexual delivered over synthetic telepathy. This is rather odd since I've never been homophobic and there are better ways to push for gay rights with the catholic church. I was invited to leave the school that year but my grades were quite high so my mother forced me to stay since it's one of the best schools in the country.
After leaving school I had my final Mathematics exam where I showed with a rather colourful and perhaps inappropriate hairstyle since the year was already over. I was kicked out of the school and after some "negotiation" where some news and incriminating photos were not published on a news paper I was readmitted with a service order being issued asking/hoping I would do something useful for society, followed by being warned by Rui Ricardo Borges Marques Sabino Reino about Luis Nazareth Carvalho Figueira having his eye on me along with some advice regarding picking good friends, seeing the world in an international context and sadly was promoting cocaine consumption for a reason I fail to understand.
Soon after I left for University College of London to do a degree in Physics and Space Science in 1996. I got a girlfriend and strangely enough whenever I met her I was forced to feel great discomfort in my testicles, often painful and nearly unbearable resulting in nervous and anxious behaviour resulting in a number of arguments. On the first occasion we had intercourse a synthetic form of ASMR culminating in a synthetic and involuntary perineum contraction resulting in synthetic premature ejaculation as an illegal sentence. At the end of my first year I was drafted into military service, but since I was studying at UCL and had a girlfriend I got myself a psychiatric leave from a doctor in order to avoid it. In the summer of 1997 whilst at Boom festival I was once again a victim of cybertorture by being forced to hear incessant payloads in the Portuguese stating "Fry, Fry, Fry" for a long period of time, along with other verbal/vocal payloads. One year later we broke up due to numerous arguments, some brought by cybertorture focusing on my genitalia. In the year 2000 I finished my graduation and on the night prior to one of my final exams I attempted to smoke some cannabis which resulted in an immediate illegal sentence of cybertorture being applied by forcing me to hear verbal/vocal payloads in the Portuguese language, a language I wasn't even using at the time to think or communicate in, and rendering me unable to study for the exam. Soon after I was forced to leave London as I was forced to roam the streets being forced to hear verbal/vocal payloads and hence rendered unable to work.
By 2001 after returning to Portugal I was once again forced to hear verbal/vocal payloads in an attempt to force me into a psychiatrist. Around 2005 I was invited by Carla Marinho Maria Rodrigues invited me into getting into a vehicle where I someone nicknamed Eros who she claimed to be her boss in the past whilst working for erotic phonelines and offered 1kg of cocaine to buy in what seemed to be a test performed by portuguese intelligence to test my level of idiocy. I immediately refused. Soon after I was tortured via cybertorture in her presence whilst at her home by former students from Colégio Militar to force a synthetic psychotic episode in her presence using her as a target against whom to direct violence we broke up. Shortly after I was directed to a psychiatrist Dr. António Gamito under cybertorture whilst being persuaded/coherced to tell him I was hearing "voices" as verbal vocal payloads where transduced to my inner ear via synthetic telepathy. A few years after I started being abused again via cybertorture with remote anal gaping via remote control of blood flow and feeling stabbed in the back via what I guess involved remote control of mechanoreceptors and nociceptors, along with a gambling trial in the format of a test presented to me as I was remotely sodomised. I could ether start crying or jump out of the window at my mothers house. Sometime after that I was interrupted whilst working on the computer by Luis Nazareth Carvalho Figueira with the phrase "What do you want?" to which I replied "I want you to fuck yourself" which was followed by a summary ad-hoc trial and an illegal sentence being issued/enforced for being rude. The sentence consisted on forcing instant psychotic behaviour by forcing me to feel vibrotactile sensations on my skull and inner ear forcing a hearing sensation similar to that of hearing a high amplitude noise/hiss which resulted in me entering a synthetic psychotic state, breaking a number of items around me and when my mother entered the room spitting on her face. This resulted in me stopping all my learning progress on coursera and waiting for trial for one year to be forcefully committed to a psychiatric institution. Upon returning from the court trial whilst waiting on the train station I was forced to hear verbal/vocal payloads issued by Pedro Grilo stating "You are done!". This led to me leaving Portugal looking for a better future in the Netherlands.
As I arrived in the Netherlands on my first week I was forced to hear verbal/vocal payloads issued by Luis Nazareth Carvalho Figueira as blood flow to my eyes was increased and a synthetic psychotic state was induced resulting in me roaming around Rembrandtplein in rage. After some time I was forced to find whichever job I could in order to survive so I did menial work for some time. By 2014 I got a job at Eenvoudmedia where I was oddly enough offered the exact same amount of money my father used to help me with when I was unemployed. On my first day at work I was once again forced to hear verbal/vocal payloads that left me rather suspicious and uncomfortable. Upon landing from my Holiday in Greece I became a victim of continuous cybertorture 24 hours a day as I started hearing verbal/vocal payloads. As my employers were not happy with my work and the environment was less than good, just before my contract was over Jasper Kums started promoting cocaine consumption and claiming to be a direct descendent of Prince Andreas in what now seem like staged efforts to force me into psychiatric care with the consent/help of law enforcement agents connected to him and my own family. Soon after I went to work at Quby where I was offered employment that was rated by my new colleagues as being above my skill set. Since the very first week I started getting negative feedback regarding my performance and abilities in what now seems like an effort to persuade me to find new employment. All along I was being forced to hear verbal/vocal payloads in a seemingly mocking/misdirecting tone whilst the environment at work got increasingly more adverse. I decided to stay at work until by the end of February after leaving work a cybertorture was enforced and synthetic state of anxiety was forced upon me resulting in an altercation on the public way with a stranger which resulted in a fight and criminal charges. The other individual involved in the altercation seemed to be under some form of synthetic psychosis possibly due to cybertorture. I continued to hear verbal/vocal payloads and the work environment kept deteriorating until around April 1st it actually became cybertorture and soon after I was redirected to a doctor at Arboned. There I was asked without even complaining "Are you hearing voices?" which sounded very strange given the fact I had never spoken to my doctor. From there I was directed to see Dr. Arjen Sutterland and a number of other psychiatrists or medicine students. I was warned by Dr. Sutterland my afflictions would become of a sexual nature and my medical report stated I had delusions about having a "microchip implanted on my skull" without me ever stating anything of that sort. After that I was redirected to VIP Mentrum where I saw a number of psychiatrists and social workers like Jurgen Van der Minnen who tried to convince to accept living at HVO-querido as a humiliation and Joost Helderoop who is nothing more than a psychiatric nurse with the Netherlands Ministry of Justice stated it was up to him if I had to take medication or not followed by asking me "Do you like it in the butt" whilst delivering the injection which sounded pretty homophobic and unprofessional. Recently I have been redirected to Dr. Emile Barkhof who on the 1st appointment suggested the individuals performing the torturous broadcast of noxious stimuli were not located in the Netherlands in an attempt to redirect me back to Portugal and what was being done to me was a consequence of not having followed an optimal career path. Then as he tried to redirect the conversation to which medications were previously tried and what was their effect I interrupted to suggest the same delivery mechanism that is used to torture people to force self-castration and self-mutilation of the skull could be used to deliver positive stimuli and something like neuromodulation could be used. He immediately issued a look of judgemental disapproval for being rude when I was trying to be assertive followed by denying any knowledge of what neuromodulation even was and asking me if I knew how things work at the "neurotransmitter level".
The torture continues being delivered to my genitalia, skull and inner ear second by second every day to force the gruesome and foul result as a large number of individuals just watch. So many others afflicted by the mediocrity and decrepitude forced into our lives in the format of ad-hoc trials followed by illegal sentences of various forms of forced human degradation and gambling with the outcomes of forcing the subject under torture to commit forced involuntary acts of self-harm (including self-mutilation and forced suicide) being issued and enforced or exacted in a summary fashion.
Yours truly,
Claudio André Silva Nunes Marques Neto

post_text:
Oyetoso was planning to marry in December. She said she had catarrh and cold when she was abducted, recalling that the incident happened around 5 pm on a Friday. But she did not specify the exact date. She stated further that she was led through a long stretch of road in the thick bush and taken to different directions.

“By then, they had tied my hands. They were four in number. Three were in the front and side while one was at the back beating me each time I slowed down. We ran over a long distance and got to a river. We ran through the night. They were obviously used to the place. They pulled me through the river with my hands tied. The water of the river was up to my neck. I was terrified and wondering what would happen to me.”

She said they had taken over her phone at that time and had also taken her fiancé’s phone in the car. “They destroyed my fiancé phone but removed the sim card and inserted it into another phone which they used to make calls.” Read more on:

post_text:
The Ogun State Commissioner and IG Must Hear This:
A Call for Justice for Tunde Sunmonu

Abdulrahman Olatunde Sunmonu, 37 years old was a transporter based in Sagamu Ogun State.

On Friday 31st July, a friend called him for a meeting at the GRA in Sagamu. He immediately prepared for the meeting and told his children to stay indoors and that he would soon be back home.

Hours after he left home, Olatunde's children called one of their uncles, one Mr. Dejola Awosanya and another of their relatives to say they couldn't reach their dad on phone and he had not returned home.

The uncle and their relative waited for 24 hours as stipulated by law for missing persons then on Sunday 2nd August they reported the case at the Sagamu Divisional Police Station. The police promised to investigate the matter.

By Tuesday 4th August, policemen from the Sagamu Police Station called Mr. Dejola Awosanya to give the most unpleasant news - Tunde Sunmonu was dead.

The DPO showed the family Tunde's driver licence and vehicle particulars and Tunde's picture in the morgue and told the family that Tunde's vehicle was towed to the station because they couldn't find the key.

Police Report Versus Eye Witness Account

Police Account
Acording to the report of the police, there was an accident at the GRA. A man hit a woman's vehicle from the rear and there was an argument between the man and the woman. Tunde was right behind them told them to take their vehicles off the road.

The man left the woman to argue with Tunde, broke Tunde's car headlamp and then attacked him with a baseball bat. He hit him several times with the bat until Tunde's skull was broken. When he saw that he was unconscious, he rushed him to the nearby hospital and transferred money to the doctors and left for the police station to report that he hit Tunde in swld defence.
The police said they are investigating the matter.

Eye Witness Account
Tunde and the culprit were friends. In fact, the culprit was the one who made the call thr day Tunde went missing to invite him to a party at the home of the Chairman of a local government, Gbenga Badru.
They were at the party whem aimed issues came up and Tunde decided to run away from the chairman's house, leaving his car behind. Some guys ran after him, caught up with him and beat him to a coma.
The vigilante came to his rescue and called in the police who arrested the culprit with the murder weapon (baseball bat) and a dagger. Tunde was taken to Idera hospital (a private hospital) at Ajaka area of Sagamu on 31st July and died on 2nd August 2020.

The family are asking the following questions:
* Why was a delay of of at least two days without the police informing the family?
* Why did the police tag Tunde as an unidentified person whereby they had all his information (his driver's licence and vehicle particulars taken from his vehicle).
* Why were his 2 phones taken and later returned by one of the culprits that ran away when the vigilante got there?
* Why did the DPO release only one phone to the family?
* Why is the local government chairman, Mr Banjo Baruwa in a hurry to bail the culprit?

Tunde Sunmonu was the first son of Hakeem Sunmonu and the only child of Yetunde Ajose-Akano.

Please help them get justice by sharing this story till the Commissioner of Police Ogun State hears about it. The IG too must hear so that the police at the station in Sagamu will not change the narratives. Thank you.

post_text:
Hello I’m new to the group, not sure why I never sought something out like this on FB before.

TW..............

I’m at a loss for words. I endured the most evil man for 14 years. I left in 2014 and he almost killed me. I woke up to him dragging me into bushes. He choked me until I went out. I’m assuming he thought he killed me.

Well I’ve been free for 6 years. However due to the family court system, this man is still allowed to abuse me. He tells the most outlandish lies in court based on my past. I have a very significant past of sexual abuse as a child.

I have my 8 year old son who lives with me. He went to dads for his month of the summer. Wouldn’t you know right before he’s suppose to coke back, I’m slapped with an RO and have had my rights to visit and legal rights taken.

I’m sure you’re asking how? This is a court case that is in Placer County in California. My ex’s mother is a very high powered attorney. I couldn’t understand for years why court kept going the way it did for me. How can my abuser with a significant criminal past as well as still committing crimes win. It’s his mother and the judge overseeing my case.

It just so happens that the judge overseeing my case use to represent mom in her own family court battle. I know it sounds crazy, but it’s a 100% true. My court case originated in Santa Clara County. When it was transferred to Placer County, 3 boxes of documents went missing and I can’t get the courts to do anything.

Fast Foward to Jesse James my 8 year old. My ex filed on 7/28/2020 for full custody. Within hours he has a court date for the following morning at 8am. This happening during COVID is unheard of. He went into court and without any proof told them I’m sex trafficking my beautiful Innocent little boy. Just on this criminals words alone they took my baby from me.

I’m devastated!!!! He’s using things that have happened to me in the past and applying them to my son now. It’s a disgusting game. It makes me feel like he is trying to minimize the trauma I went through as well as use it to continue to abuse me through the court system.

He’s been arrested at least 10 times since I left. He has placed a GPS tracker on my moving vehicle and has a current case pending against him for stalking. How can this be possible. I’m tired of this. I go back to court on 8-24 and I would love to bring women together and protest the system allowing our abusers to continue through the legal system and stop this madness.

When I tell people what’s happening they look at me like I’m insane. You shouldn’t have to go through this for the rest of your life, children or not. It needs to stop. If anyone is interested in something like this please feel free to DM me.

I’ll be praying that I can get enough attention on my case that the courts will have to do the right thing.

post_text:
Trigger Warning ⚠️ Domestic Violence

Hi, my name is Dianne. I was raised in a broken home because my dad was so violent. Parents divorced and I grew into depression at the age of 11. I’ve tried to commit suicide multiple times due to deep depression. My first time was age 15. Last time was age 21. I’ve tried overdosing but God kept me alive...Never again. I’m finally healed mind, body, and soul due to center and ground meditation + positive manifestation everyday. Life is hard but it’s worth all the smile, laughs, and happiness you can find along the way. Stay positive, have faith, and smile. Life is worth living for 🦋

post_text:
Trigger Warning ⚠️ Domestic Violence

My whole life has been nothing but domestic violence and I am DONE with the cycle. I had such a traumatizing childhood because of my own Dad: watching him beat up my mom and all the childish road rage from him. He pulled a gun to her head, broke her chin, and she had to get plastic surgery.

The first sign of abuse towards me was convincing me that “Starving is good for you.” I would come home from school hungry and there was absolutely NOTHING to eat and I would just cried. My dad thought I was fat so he would tell people to “watch my diet.”

When I was 18, I wanted to move out but he beat me up instead and then said later, “I did it because I love you.” Domestic violence should not be normalized. How many times can we forgive someone before we realize that they will never change??

My dad even sucker punched me while I was looking out the window when I was 6 months pregnant. I’ve tried to press charges but DA is a joke! “Insufficient evidence,” regardless of photos of abuse and previous police report.

Now ever since my husband passed away, my dad’s controlling behavior returned and I do not live with him nor does he financially support me in any way. “She’s getting fat. Give her half the meal. Stop breastfeeding her. Answer me when I call you.” My dad would called late at nights and expect me to answer my phone. It’s really sad that my dad doesn’t see what beautiful grandchildren he have; instead he see people who are “fat” and not perfect by his high standards.

I kept hearing “It’s family’s business” until my loved one got murdered (by someone else) and then it’s out there for the whole world to see!! I recently moved so my dad doesn’t have my new address. Please... Do not silence DOMESTIC VIOLENCE.

post_text:
I don't no if this count for anything to be allowed in this group Hello Everyone My Name is Ashley I am 32 years old I was born July 8, 1987 I am new here I want to try to share my story am sorry if this is a trigger warning for a lot of people. I am not sure where to being. I don't remember when the sexual abuse start but I do remember that my mom's boyfriend's newphew started his abusing me at the age of 7 or 8 and it lasted until I was 9 1/2. But my mom's boyfriend's which is my two little sister's father was molesteding all of us girls and my yougest sister was maybe 1 or 2. When my mom found out she took us to our grandparents house and then called the cops he was arrested. The next day we was put in a foster home because the house was drity and my mom lost her rights this was in 1998 I was 9 1/2. Most of my life I have been abused the man on my Birth certificate as my father isn't my biographical father. I found that out in 2014. He gave me up to his parents in 2000 they adopted me in 2002. My adopted father started touching me. So I was put in a foster home at age 16 I aged out of foster care. I found my biographical mom and her family in 2004 or 2005. I have had a few very wonderful relationship but not a lot most of the guys I dated had a lot of abusive anger problems. My soon to be ex husband and the father of my t
3 children I married twice once in 2009 and again in 2014. We met in 2007. I have had a long and painful road I have had 17 miscarriages because of abusive and because of my Epilepsy and one was all my fault because I didn't know I was pregnant and I drink a lot of alcohol and fell off a truck bed onto the ground on my stomach and went into a seizure. I am very lucky to have the 3 I do have but Because of my soon to be ex husband being controlling and abusive I gave my children up for adoption in 2012 my youngest just was born my oldest was 3 my middle one was 2 I have 2 girls and a boy every once in awhile their adopted mother sends me photos of them but it's been about 2 years. The reason why I wanted to share my story is because I am hoping someone could help me because the man I am in love with now and am engaged to is very abusive I thing he has a split personality disorder but because he doesn't have insurance no doctor will see him without us pay 300 to 400 a visit. He has a very violent temper. More then once he has left burises on me I have taken pictures everytime he leves a mark on me there was one time I had to go to the hospital be he hurt my wrist and he took the phone I bought and told the cops it was his and because I did have the receipt they could not do anything. He deleted everything out of my phone he didn't go to Jail because he lied to the cops. The officer that talked to me asked me if there was a safe place for me to go for the night and because he took my phone I couldn't get a hold of my mom or my Aunt the only place I could go to was my soon to be ex husband's house. The last fight we got into he almost killed me and my pit Bull mix because my dog was barking because the cats outside was fighting. I couldn't provide proof that he did anything to the dog so I am going to put up cameras. This man I have been with for 2 years almost 3 and he has a problem with talking to other women and tell tjem he loves them he misses them he wants to be with them that he can't waith to hold them and kiss them and he has them send pics of themselves and I know of a few times he sent a few of his own pics to some girls I know he did with one of his co workers he use to work with when I was nice to let hwr stay with us because she had no where to go. I do know what to do because he wants to get the help and we both are starting free classes at the end of this month. But the other place he needs to go is called Highland Rivwrs in Dalton GA and I believe for each class or time you go its 80.00. I have my family and some of my friends saying to leave and I have his family and his friends and some of my friends and our friends together telling me to get him the help he needs.

post_text: Does anyone know any legitimate places where I can fun a full background check on someone if I have their social security number? Like the way a landlord could to see any arrest records, convictions etc? I want to pull up my abusers full arrest record, I’ve tried calling County and State PD but unless you were some way involved in the arrest (like the person who filed a report, the victim etc.) they won’t give you someone’s arrest records and in my state they can’t be found on any government website.

post_text:
I am in need of resources in the Smyrna/Cobb county Georgia area. The resources I am looking for are:
1. domestic violence shelters,
2. emergency housing for women
3. More long term or at the very least transitional housing
4. Rooms for rent someone on disability can afford
5. Anyone or organization in that area that might be willing to foster my emotional support animal a 10 pound dog if the emergency shelter I go to does not allow ESAs. She is 7 years old & has been through what can only be described as hell. I am 100% not re-homing her & I am respectfully asking no one bring that up.
6. Also please pm me if you live anywhere near there and would be willing to be a local support person for me.

I would also like to request good vibes & prayers from any belief system that is right for you for me and my family through this difficult time. My child’s father is a good man & not why I need help. However he is seriously disabled & can’t help me with a safe place to stay. I prefer to go into as little details as possible & ask if you have any resources you pm me and NOT comment them. I want as few people as possible to know who I am looking for help from.

I apologize for giving such few details but it is better that way right now. Once I know this is over & we are all safe I plan to share in this group in much more detail

The only detail I will give is this hell all started for me October 13, 2017 or at least that is when I became aware of what was going on. Ever since I have been running being found usually within a week everywhere I move. It is like the evil gift that just keeps giving. I just want to be able to slow down knowing we are safe and relax as a person and mother. I hope where I am headed next Smyrna will be one of the final stepping stones to that peace I want so badly for me, my child’s father/BF and my baby girl

post_text:
Ladies,
Due to privacy concerns, I will not post this precious ladies name publicly. My family has decided to help out a young mother of 2 precious children. They are ALL 3 victims of domestic violence from the father/husband. they are in our home until further notice. Child services IS involved. This lady got the courage to get away after barely surviving getting strangled to near death prior to being kicked and suffering a broken rib.. both children were locked up in their room in the process for about 2 hours while mother was being held and hurt. I want to give these 3 a wonderful Christmas, but funds are just so tight. PLEASE, if any of you can spare some extra cash so that we can go buy them some necessities, clothing, toys, etc, that would be so greatly appreciated. They LEFT and didn’t look back or even attempt to go back for any of their belongings.. Husband was arrested but of course released on bond and they do not want to return to even gather their stuff, and I do not blame them. A protection order has been applied for. Please keep this post in the group because chances of the father/husband finding where they are. If you can help, please please help, with anything!!

Our cashapp hashtag is $A3Esales
Or we have chime, fb pay, google pay, Apple Pay, pretty much any means to receive.

Photos WILL be uploaded so everyone can see how much this community of moms and women have come together for these precious survivors and warriors.

Also, if you do not trust sending money, even a Christmas gift being mailed for the little ones would be greatly appreciated. One boy, one girl, ages 3 and 4. 💜

post_text:
I felt like I finally had a place to rent free from abuse. It is a good neighborhood on a ranch with very few homes around and only two miles to the nearest gas station and less than 3 miles to the nearest store so not too far from civilization but far enough. Nice country atmosphere with horses and cats. The only draw back is the landlord lives on the property and normally I like my privacy where the landlord is not right there all the time and a few feet from me to just knock at my door at anytime. Because I had been victimized by a gang I thought renting from someone with a law enforcement past and to a point still works in that field was a positive. I felt this was my dream place and perfect.

Now my landlord has been coming onto me despite him living on the property with a woman he calls his wife and she calls him her husband. I have respectfully kept it very professional and clearly rejected his advances. Now he is getting verbally abusive in texts just going after me way out of preparation over tiny things threatening to kick me out. He was a federal profiler and knows at the last place I could afford I was threatened with weapons so loosing this place right now could put me in great danger and cost me not getting my daughter back. I feel like he is angry I won’t sleep with him and he is just taking it out of me. I have been taking good care of the place, paying my bills and outside of a couple small one time mistakes done nothing wrong here. He has taken to texting me in the middle of the night more than once to try to get into my pants then tonight at 12:30 in the morning to rant. It left me shaking. I know he can see my light on but still no boundaries. I feel as a profiler he knows exactly how it is effecting me. When he rented a place in Miami every person he rented to destroyed his place one even took the fridge and air conditioner. I have been through so much and it is like everywhere I rent is a problem. I thought here was finally different. I am going through so much still this bullying landlord is not what I need right now. I feel like abusive men just gravitate to me. I just feel lost.

Baby photos just to show off

post_text:
Hi! My name is Jessica. I am a survivor of DV and IPV. I have been a survivor since my son was officially 6 months old and that means I am about 8 years out. I have researched DV since I went back to school. It started as a 3-page research report where I looked into laws and the progression of the judicial system around DV and IPV (which has not always been legally represented). Then it became an independent study during my bachelor's and my master's project in which I created my nonprofit which finally received 501(c)(3) status in March of this year!

It has been a looooong road. It is now my dissertation!! I am set to (hopefully) finish my Ph.D. in May. My niche is the impact creativity has on survivors of DV. Please consider liking my business page! This research is going to revolutionize survivor-hood. My intuition, heart, and soul vibrate in excitement because I have already had the pleasure of piloting what I am researching and it had phenomenal results! Just looking for support!

Please and thank you. I would truly appreciate it!

https://www.facebook.com/synergyservicesalliance/

I'm desperately seeking immediate help with some financial assistance or possible gift cards to Wal-Mart and for gas. I have a half roll of toilet paper, no baby wipes or diapers, 23 miles till empty in my car, no food till Tue and one of my girls has a fever amd needs medication. can you or do you know of anyone that can please help me I have a paypal.me/twinmom9216 account and ive been told there are gift cards available from quick trip gas station and Wal-Mart or target you can send to an email address luvalexis630@gmail.com even $5 would help me so Much and be so appreciated thank u for your time

post_text: March 22, 2014 My life took a drastic turn. On that day I was shot 5x's by my now deceased ex boyfriend. He shot me in my face, chest, and back several times. (Attempted murder suicide) The right side of my nose was shot off, which deceased my air flow so a tracheostomy was placed. In inside of my mouth was wired shut and a feeding tube was place in my stomach. My recovery process while in the Hospital/ Rehabilitation was hell 😭. I am now paralyzed on the right side of my face, deaf in my right ear, not able to close my right eye, not able to eat on the right side of my mouth, I have a torn rotator cuff in my left arm, I deal with chronic migraines,and the list goes on. I suffer from PTSD, BIPOLAR DEPRESSION, ANXIETY, MOOD SWINGS, and etc.. We were off and on for 5years. At the time I thought he was my soulmate, and my bestfriend. But apparently was wrong. I was physical abused the whole 5years of our relationship. My ex had mental health issues and it was Beyond me. At the time I was to young to understand. I am not a weak person mentally, but my weakness was LOVE❤ But I was a ride or die literally. As a young woman I'm here you tell you, it's not worth your life or your family lives. Learn the red flags and get the fuck out, before it's to late. If you feel like your partner needs help please Recommend it to them, In a nice way😇. It's more to my story.. ALOT MORE. I didn't break the curse. Im here to bring awareness to all people dealing with abuse and or mental health issues. This is my 1st speaking publicly about this. Follow me on my Instagram page: @timiraloveee or Facebook: Timira Lovee Please join my Group (Life Beyond Surviving💜) Come take this journey with me. YOU ARE NOT ALONE! #LifeBeyondSurviving💜

post_text: I need some advice. When using my own name to do animal rescue I have repeatedly been victimized along with the animals I have rescued by my abusers. Any animal I help is at risk. Also people I have gotten close to doing rescue work have had their animals harmed or threatened as well as themselves. Before this happened helping animals was my entire world. I tried to make a Facebook account under a different name so I could continue being a part of the online rescue world I have been a part of before Facebook even came to be. Is there a way in situations of abuse where the person’s life is endanger Facebook allows accounts with other names? Any other suggestions? Even if no one knew which groups I was in a few people in the rescue community helped my abusers so my name is like a dead giveaway and super unusual

post_text:
I am trying to find someone or an organization to drive my pets 5 hours from Tallahassee Florida to Avon Park. If I had the money I have someone willing to do it but I put all my disability into a new safe home for my family. I know most of you don’t have any extra money and I am not going to ask a bunch of victims for money anyway. But I thought maybe one of you has an idea of a resource I can use to get the money or just as good or better you are driving that way anyway and can just have a little dog and 2 kittens as extra passengers

I wrote this because I really need suggestions including if there is a way as an adult to legally divorce my parents but I want to warn you my story is a:

TRIGGER WARNING

MAJOR TRIGGER WARNING

-
-
-
-
-

Due to things being so unsafe and bad I had to move again in an emergency situation I left my chihuahua and two kittens in unsanitary conditions. I feel really bad because no life should be in that home it is like something you would see on hoarders and the woman caring for them has been accused of neglecting her own pets. They have to be so scared. The dog is 7 years old and watched my late husband die slowly over the first 4 years of her life. After his death her 3rd owner my best friend and roommate was murdered. She was never the same dog so depressed with anxiety OCD behaviors. She just laid their. Then for weeks someone involved in her other owners murdered drugged me without my knowledge and raped me in front of her. Then because of what that man did to me we were on the street in the freezing rain for days.

I have written this story and re written it so many times. I am just not ready to tell even close to the whole story. I am broken and looking to end this on going stalking and abuse. I left home because of sexual and other abuses at 16 and married an abusive man. It was all worth every beating because it cut the legal ties from my abusive parents and emancipated me from my parents. I still had younger siblings so I kept a distant very painful relationship with my parents to see my siblings.

My parents stalked me and used criminals and gang members to follow me and report back to them from 12 step meetings and group therapy. They even had some mental health providers and some doctors and nurses to break the hips laws.

I made power of attorney papers so I could choose who made decisions if I was medically unable. I also made a will when I was not even pregnant to protect my child from my parents ever having access which was my worse fear. When I was unconscious they found out from the people stalking me and were allowed in the hospital room where I was unconscious. I was as sick and creeped out as if they just raped me again.

Then my best friend was murdered so I would be vulnerable to be drugged without my knowledge and raped for weeks. My rapist confessed with details only her killer could know. My own parents had me raped and killed the one person alive I loved most less than 4 months after my husband died the love of my life.

The rape was made to make me vulnerable to get me to date my daughter’s father so I would have his child whom the planned to convince me to help them blackmail her dad’s family. As soon as I was pregnant there were attempts on his life. I have moved like 30 times in 3 states in 2 years. I have had pets stolen, poisoned, eyes burned blind with Chemicals while she was nursing kittens and the list goes on. Before my daughter my pets were the only reason I had to live.

They set people up to befriend me just to get my personal interaction. I was told my entire pregnancy that if Idid not move out of state and in with the woman they set up to friend me who I found out later wanted my daughter and lied and say my baby was not her fathers and never tell him or his family the baby was ever born they would get dirty DCF to take my daughter. I knew as soon as I left the state there was a plan in place to kill the man I loved my child’s father. Sadly they did get dirty DCF workers to lie under oath knowingly to take her. It was claimed I was low functioning mentally retarted and incapable of changing a diaper when my profession was child care trained and licensed by DCF in this state for years.

There is so much more. It is worse and actually way worse of a story as a whole then I explained here. Because they use at least one street gang and at least a couple other criminal organizations to find things out I don’t know if I can ever get safe. My mother drills my sister’s young children to find things out. If she find out where I am she is such a good at manipulating she can convince anyone she is the hero mom who made a few mistakes I won’t forgive and I am evil and she is helping me. Fighting for my daughter so far I got 3 useless lawyers because I am disabled from the abuse and don’t have money. My mother has tried to as a grandmother get visitation from the state.

They want me to live like I was raised in an abusive cult growing up and I will not go back to any of my abusers including the cult. Everyone I have gotten close to has been threatened by my mother, had years worth of false allegations made to the cops and had sick sexual gossip said about them. When I was 13 she was friends with the cops wife next door. This woman volunteered for hours to drive her around and teach her to drive. I was close with her 10 year old daughter then became close with her mom too. The cop was on the force over 20 years, he was retired CIA and retired marines. When they met his wife was also a marine. For years my mother threatened to kill that how family. At least 8 times she threatened to kill the couple with their 2 child in front of 8 cop. She made false reports against them for 20 years. They were both afraid for their lives and safety and spent 20 years trying to sell
Their house so they could afford to leave. I was only close with the family for 3 years.

Where I live is now safe but I do not know what to do to stop this all together.

I never understood how my parents could do these things and not love me and protect me. But since having my baby daughter I have no idea at all how they could not love their kids like I do my daughter and how they can use my daughter to hurt me. This story only includes a fraction of the hell I have been through. I hope someone can relate to something so I don’t feel so alone on the one hand. On the other hand I hope I am the only person to go through anything like this. I would not wish this on my worked enemy

post_text: I am dealing with a de facto situation in my hometown. The father of my son is the son of the judge presiding on my case. She stripped me of custody completely and placed a restraining order against me, ALL based upon a mental health episode of my sons other grandma. My son now resides in a household where he is exposed to her pedophile husband and her mental illness. Because my kids father is law enforcement and the son of the iudge, police will not file charges. The federal court here has been sitting on my processing fee application for over 2 1/2 weeks on a civil injunction request and civil lawsuit filed against the judge, sheriff's office, state of NM and the DAs office for a slew of charges and rights violations clearly on record. Meanwhile, this judge and her friends are continuing to make rulings on my cases and falsely acquired trumped up criminal charges. What resources exist or laws do you maybe know of that can stop this deprivation of rights and get my son free of these baseless orders? Feel free to share cause we are being railroaded and it's been 4 months since I've seen a child I've raised for 9 years, he's so scared now that he's lying to care providers. Police are refusing to conduct any sort of welfare check as they already know he's with his dad....which is not where he's supposed to be per court orders. Is there any organization nationally that can help? Please do not suggest local domestic violence resources as they are all on contact with his unit constantly.

post_text: Hi my name is Nicole Bogad. I'm a single mom of 2 1/2 year old Twin girls and a recent survivor of domestic violence living in House Springs, MO. My girls father was incarcerated when they were 3 weeks old on felony domestic abise charges after stomping on my cesection incision and blacking my eye. He was released this past October and from them until 3 weeks ago he has given me multiple busted lips, black eyes and bruises. The final straw came when I was being punched by him pinned against a kitchen cabinet with my girls screaming in fear as they watched the only person they know to protect them unable to protect herself. That was the worst feeling as a mother I have ever felt. The next day I went and filed for a restraining order and that week he was at my house nightly knocking on doors and windows, shining flashlights in and threatening me thru locked doors. He was arrested 4 times that week and released 3 of them. He was finally kept after found outside my daughter's bedroom window at 330 in the morning wearing a Michael Myers mask. Its been a nightmare. I'm trying and doing everything I can to try and provide a healthy safe home for myself and my girls it just seems like for every step forward im getting knocked back two. We lived in a shelter prior to moving here with hud assistance in February and while their dad was locked up previously doing what i had to do to make it meant selling my car leaving me without something essential for daily living and that I have had since I was 16. I was finally able to purchase a cheap vehicle in March but once again knocked down with the news that my abuser had failed to pay my property tax for the last 2 years leaving me with a past due bill of $350 that has to be paid before im able to license my new car. Along with that my check engine light came on a couple weeks ago due to a Cadillac convertor problem making it not able to pass another inelection when the current when expires in 11 days. I have no income coming in at this time until the hardship TANF I applies for goes thru and no help or support really. In addition to this I'm in need of almost everything Wal-Mart sells, some furniture and furnishings for the new place, clothes and a vacation wpuld be amazing!!!! Scratch the last thing just dreaming out loud! I need some help please if there's anything you can do or a direction you can lead me in I would appreciate it so much. Thank you for your time and god bless!
